controlling your music is easy thanks to the mobile application.
don’t change a single habit, you can stream your music over octavio from your favorite application.
control your music from the octavio application, choose your audio source, adjust the volume and manage your devices.
to enjoy your music even faster, there are buttons on the device itself to start and stop sound broadcasting.
with €10 000 we can start the production of our devices.
we plan to add features to our product and contribute to our evolution to make octavio even more incredible!
octavio is born out of the meeting of two music lovers, victor et david.
it’s on the benches of university, during our musicology master, that we had the idea to create octavio.

passionate about music and new technologies, we both found ourselves faced with the same problem when listening to music at home: as soon as we left a room, we couldn't hear the music playing in it anymore.
so we decided to create a device that would allow us to listen to our music without interruption, in every room of our house.
once the device was created, we witnessed the enthusiasm of our friends for our creation.
so we decided to make it possible for everyone to benefit from this innovation.
it is therefore, after many hours spent improving the solution and many tests carried out with a large panel, that we are pleased to announce the launch of octavio.
incubated at plaine images, we have discovered a real entrepreneurial spirit.

both of us have found our place within octavio's management team and in order to give ourselves the means to bring this project to success, we have decided to launch this interactive fundraising campaign.
launching a new hardware product on the market is complicated.
there are a lot of expenses to bear in mind, there are different aspects of our product that requires your help.
of course there is the production of the electronics and the purchase of our components, but also the certification process to guarantee the safety of our product.
the production of our octavio is only a part of our activity.
we have research and development costs as well: embedded systems mobile application.
to offer you a product with a likeable design, we also need money to have our injection tools manufactured.
finally, as with any product, communication and marketing expenses are necessary to make it visible on the market.
did you know that over 30% of all speakers thrown out a year, still work?
at octavio, we are convinced that over-consumption of this type of equipment can be avoided.
why would you renew your entire audio system when it's still working?
to benefit from the latest technology of course.
and on this point, we have to admit, we love the latest innovations as well.
but we love our eco-system even more.
rather than imposing a new sound system on you, and forcing you to put away your old speakers in the closet, we've chosen to give them a second youth.
after all, they play music, and that's all we ask of them.
octavio takes care of the rest.
octavio makes any system compatible with today's sound diffusion technologies and it is regularly updated, so you can always benefit from the latest innovations.
program aging and repairability, a hot topic.
the octavio unit is designed to be fully repairable.
in fact, octavio is made up of several parts that are independent from each other.
a problem on the sound card side?
we replace this defective part, leaving the rest of the device intact.
the case is designed to be dismantled, so we can easily repair each of the devices.
the iot device that respects your privacy.
everything that happens in your house stays in your house.
we have no desire and no interest in collecting your personal data.
octavio is entirely secure, and benefits from regular security updates.
we designed octavio with you, thanks to you and for you!
your feedback has allowed us to improve the product and made us grow.

mystik: a next-generation portable cassette player. mystik: a bluetooth cassette player that walks the line between modern features and preserving the analog integrity so many desirei
t's simple: a new portable cassette player (and recorder) engineered and built for the 21st century with an honest emphasis on quality audio playback:
the quest for more analog sound : ever since the dawn of humankind, people have had a fascination with the power of sound.
when we started making music, we realized the best part of it was sharing the sound with others, as it held the ability to convey transcendent emotions such as joy, sadness, or love.
during a mystical time known affectionately by some as the “1960s”, the compact audio cassette was invented.
the audio cassette allowed us to share our music far and wide with others, and to listen to it wherever we went.
the cassettes captured magic known as ‘analog sound’.
analog sound are sound waves that have been preserved in their purest form.
it is what you hear when you are listening to a live singer, or instrumental performance, for example.
we see and hear these waves not as the ‘0’s and ‘1’s of modern audio reproduction, but as an infinitely extending wave.
cassettes serve not only as a simple recording format but as time capsules & vessels of emotion.
how can you help us on this quest? today, we need your help in building the next-generation portable cassette player.
we are music lovers and we have heritage from many names in the past: basf, agfa, pyral.
today our passion for analog music has brought us to become missionaries.
missionaries of analog sound.
we call ourselves ‘recording the masters’.
we’ve gone part of the way, but can’t complete the journey without you!
will you support us on our quest to bring you the cassette player you deserve?
where are we now, and where do we want to go?

as one might imagine, building a cassette player is a mechanical accomplishment that requires a lot of attention to detail, precision engineering and continual experimentation to achieve the best sound possible within natural constraints such as cost and portability.
armed with only the passionate dedication and expertise of former thomson/rca audio engineers we focused on building a new electronic board for good audio playback.
we were happy with the results.
after the warm reception we received we decided to take it to the next level.
thus, the idea for mystik was born.

so far, we've built our first prototype, this player that you see below: this image displays the electronic board that we have dedicated time and money to for the purpose of bringing you good quality audio playback.
our ultimate goal, however, and what we will be able to bring you if we reach our fundraising target, has a lot more than what we see above.

the new player will feature improved audio playback, bluetooth functionality (yes, you will have the ability to switch it on and off, for those who prefer to maintain a wired connection and analog integrity), a rechargeable battery eliminating the recurring need to purchase disposable batteries, and a larger transparent viewing window to enjoy the spinning reels of a playing cassette.

the objective is to combine the best modern technology has to offer without compromising on the essence of analog music, all while offering the user the choice of which aspect to indulge in at any given moment.
want to keep that a a a? plug in your headphones.
want to play your hot new mix-tape for everyone at the house party next weekend? connect to your favorite bluetooth speaker.
our works-like prototype
the initial design studies and digital tooling for the new player are complete.
the fundraising accomplished by this kickstarter is what will allow us to bring this new tooling and device from the digital world to the real world, and eventually to the palm of your hand.
in addition to the mechanical tooling, the funds raised will allow us to continue development and further improve the audio playback and recording features.
here is a wire-frame rendering of the new design: wireframe rendering of mystik: with your help we will get this tooled irl

why will this be a next-generation portable cassette player? bluetooth 5.0 stereo transmitter with on/off switch ; stereo player/recorder with auto-stop ; 3.5mm stereo headphone jack ; 3.5mm line rec jack ;  in-built microphone for 'quick-start' recording ; rechargeable battery ;  usb 5.0v dc charging cable ; playback frequency response 40hz-11khz w&f <=0.4% ; detachable belt clip ; compatible with all cassette types!

if we are all successful in our quest, our new player will be unique because it will contain modern features while also maintaining all the features you loved about the classic players: portability, compactness, quality stereo audio.
with mystik, you won't need to compromise in either direction.
why trust us to be your guides on this quest?
as music lovers ourselves and as one of the world’s last manufacturers of tape and cassettes we have always sought out the best possible sound, and prioritized quality and consistency above all.
on our journey so far to share the pleasures of analog audio we’ve partnered with artists, sound engineers, record labels and music festivals.
this means you can trust us to guide you on this adventure to achieve the best analog sound on cassette that we can.
we strive for the best audio quality above all else.
about recordingthemasters : today we are proud to say that we are the leading manufacturer of professional and semi-professional analog audio tapes worldwide.
but it wasn’t always that way.
when we made the decision to enter the world of analog tape, we were accepting a challenge on multiple fronts.
first, the number of people that knew how to work with tape was on the decline.
many recording studios had already switched to fully digital operations.
meanwhile, on the production end there were increasingly few engineers that were familiar with the sophisticated manufacturing process.
nevertheless, with over thirty years of experience in the magnetic world we decided to rise to the challenge.

inheriting the legendary formulations from former giants in the tape world: basf and agfa, the formulations we produce today (sm 900, sm 911, and sm 468) have an esteemed track record of more than forty years of renowned performance in the industry.
thus, recordingthemasters was born, and our c.e.o.
and visionary jean-luc renou set out to build an analog tape company like no other.
the years that have passed since then have had their obstacles but have otherwise been very rewarding.
it soon became clear that we had found ourselves in the role of torchbearers for the next generation.
for us, it became not simply about selling a material but about truly preserving the medium.
we’ve sponsored masterclasses where experts in their field have taught young and eager sound engineers the intricacies of working with tape.
for us, it truly became about the music above all.
we believe that our recording tape provides a medium worthy of your music.
now let’s build a device worthy of your audio cassettes.
ioteedom mit future cities . trade data with your profile ; connect your devices and join the community ; measure sdgs and get rewarded
this project is to fund the ioteedom team to attend the mit future cities bootcamp.
the bootcamp will help ioteedom build the smart cities connected platform within the mit community, aid of the faculty and access to research and data.
we were selected to attend this bootcamp and want to create active participation in building a larger community to be a part of our mission in planning for the cities of tomorrow.
those that contribute will be early adopters on the ioteedom network.
we want to create the ability for everyone to take social networking a step further.
this will require active participation and exploring your environment.
the platform will give our community a 3d visual into our cities and how well each area is achieving sustainable development goals.
our community will have the ability to interact directly with their environments and resources to help influence these goals.
ioteedom will provide the tools to our community network to measure their social impact and track their progress toward achieving these goals more efficiently.

our connected platform will provide the bridge between governments, corporations and citizens to feel we are taking small steps in making big changes toward positive social, environmental and economic impact.
help us get started building the community and be a part of the change in transforming our future cities together.

double filtration lifetime reusable clear mask . double filter mask reusable for life, clear and very light that fully inactivates pathogens, allergens, pollution, smoke and dust.
a double filter mask n95 that shows your face, lifetime usage, compatible with face id apps !
now you can unlock your phone with your face !
no elastics and no straps !
our project: dmask is the first transparent filtering mask in the world and it is also the only self-supporting mask without elastics or straps.
the objective of this kickstarter campaign is to fund tooling and certifications so that we can quickly start deliveries around the world.

thanks to you, contributors, this project could greatly exceed our expectations which will allow us to invest in a more efficient automated production unit in order to lower sales prices and make dmask accessible to all.
we promise to affix an engraved plaque at the reception desk of our factory with the names of the ten largest contributors.

the concept, the idea, and the vision of the project being already well established, a battery of in-depth and thorough tests followed, mainly concerning the thicknesses, the flexibility of the material, the quality of the transparency, the performance of the filtering media, an efficient double filtration, the maximum lightening of the mask, the ease of washing, the comfort, the non-toxicity of the material and the longevity of the product.

thus, after having obtained very conclusive and positive feedback that went even beyond our expectations and dmask's expectations, our concept of a functional and industrializable protective mask was born.
in a contaminated environment, wearing a mask is essential, but not just any mask, an effective mask should be used to filter out the smallest particles that are invisible to the naked eye
lightweight and self-supporting, dmask only rests on the bucco-nasal region and the back of the neck.
as for the filter holder, it is rotatable.
this way, it is easy to orient it downwards in case of rain so as not to hinder the mask wearer.
if the mask needs to be removed for eating or drinking, simply lower it and turn it a quarter turn to keep it on the shoulder.
features of dmask : here is a brief overview of what dmask will certainly bring you compared to the current masks available on the market
dmask is very economical, as the filter only needs to be replaced once a month.
dmask can be used for life* dmask is easy to wash and can be reused immediately after wiping.
dmask does not release airborne contaminants clumped to the mask surface after a cough or sneeze.
dmask makes your face completely visible.
dmask allows you to see facial expressions, smiles, makeup.
dmask allows the hearing impaired to read lips.
dmask allows you to tan without leaving marks.
dmask is self-supporting, without elastics or straps, and is very comfortable to wear.
dmask totally frees the ears, avoiding the pain and discomfort of elastics or straps, and allows the wearing of glasses or hearing aids.
dmask is customizable thanks to the bars supplied in 3 different colors.
dmask has almost no surface in contact with the face.
dmask is compatible with the " face id " application.
dmask does not fear rain.
dmask filters in both directions.
specifications : techniques unlike traditional masks, dmask is fully transparent all-over filtering mask that purifies the air
dmask is made from approved lumexg plastics, 100% food contact certified and phthalate free.
dmask is ultralight as it weighs only 65 grams.
dmask is an air purifying and anti-pollution mask, 100% transparent, which filters both in and out.
food contact agrement
voc test report

dmask is equipped with two filters: a copper filter to the european standard en 12735-1 / en 13348 ; an efficient ultra-fine particle filter that can filter out 99.932% of particles as small as 0.3 µm in diameter.

the filtering surface of dmask is 200 cm2, equivalent to a rectangle of 10 x 20 cm, but only occupies a volume of 4 x 8 x 1 cm due to the pleated filter media, and therefore the effort to breathe is very minimal.
filter test report
sizes dmask exists in two sizes, l and m, the breathing tubes are adjustable to fit all morphologies.

on june 19, 2020, i filed the patent registered under the number: fr2006436 in order to manufacture this innovative protective mask in france and quickly start marketing dmask worldwide by moving to industrial production if the kickstarter campaign allows me to do so.
thus giving everyone the possibility to benefit from the efficiency, comfort and aesthetics of dmask, all at very advantageous prices.
for a 12 hours use per day, in one month, a single dmask filter is equivalent to 90 disposable masks!
dmask is therefore not only an adequate and recommended solution for protective masks, but also an alternative to limit the pollution index in the world.
dmask, for which a patent has been registered, can be used for life only the filters have to be changed every month..
sealing the malleable shape memory bar guarantees a good seal.
this element also makes it possible to widen the mask to be able to talk without any problem.
among other things, it prevents the glasses from fogging up.
maintenance dmask can be washed very easily with hot water and soap.
it is also possible to clean it with hydro-alcoholic gel.
afterwards, just dry it and reuse it immediately.
you can also use a uv sterilizer to disinfect your mask.
3 color bars will be provided with each mask.
shipping:  shipping will be charged in our pledge manager after the campaign.

handart a mobile application bringing artists and art lovers together.
handart is a web and mobile application designed to help artists and audiences adapt to the conditions imposed by the covid pandemic.
at handart, we want to offer solutions to difficulties artists are facing due to the closing of music venues, theaters, galleries, and museums.
we also want to mke it possible for audiences to continue enjoying live performances and shows.
handart is a toolbox of features that allows artists to continue their work while helping audiences find beauty and inspiration in their own backyard.
wait, so how does handart work for artists exactly?
our goal is to help artists continue to perform in new and improvised spaces, when more traditional venues are closed or have limited programming.
when an artist joins handart, they receive their own personal qr code.
this code can be displayed during a performance/event/show for audience members to scan with their phones.
after the code is scanned, a web browser page will display information provided by the artist in live time.

design: jean-nicolas lechatfor example, if an opera singer is singing an italian aria on the banks of the seine in paris, passers-by will be able to access the lyrics being sung, a translation of the text, the name of the piece, and any other information the artist would like to provide.
using the hand-art application, the artist will be able to update the page the audience is viewing as the concert progresses in one easy click.
audience members will be able to follow along, and even send the artist a tip or message, if they choose to download the application.
handart is not only for performing artists, but visual artists as well.
the qr code can be displayed next to pieces of art or painted beside a mural.
artists will also have access to a calendar where they can add upcoming events that can be seen by anyone using the application.
and how does handart work if you’re looking for an event?
handart makes it easy and exciting to find that hidden concert or secret mural in the neighborhood you’re exploring, or an event happening down the street from your house.
a fan using the application will be directed to a map that geo-localizes their location and shows events happening or works of art being displayed in real time.
different filters can be added to help users find a specific type of event on particular dates or at a specific time.

the map can also be used in different cities throughout the world, making it simple to find something fun and local to do on a weekend trip to an unfamiliar place, without the hassle of wading through different websites and social media.
this tool enables new artists to be heard and discovered, and gives traditional institutions an easy way to market their events to a broad and international audience.
are there other features? of course!

the handart team is developing interesting add-ons including an option to send tips to artists, insurance for artists, chat features between artists and fans, sponsorships for artists, and sale of merch from an artist’s homepage.
who are the people behind handart?
amelia feuer (ceo and co-founder)i grew up in new york, and moved to france 11 years ago.
i’m an opera singer, and work in opera houses all over europe.
during the global pandemic, i created “pop-up opera” – a concept that brought opera to the streets of paris, offering performances in public spaces throughout the city.
my “pop-up opera” program was a success, and was featured on national french television.
the feedback from audiences in the street was also very positive.
the only difficulty was finding a way to tell the audience the name and bio of the performer as well as the piece being sung.
i founded hand-artto make it easier for artists to share information with their audiences and to give audiences the opportunity to find new and exciting artists.
serena chamoun (web developer and co-founder): i grew up in lebanon, and came to france 6 years ago.
before working as a web designer, i worked in the audiovisual industry, and frequently collaborated with artists.
i’m a big fan of art and culture and have always admired artists.
i’m very much aware of the difficulties that artists face at the moment, and want to work towards finding a solution.
i’ve been looking for a project that combines my two passions: art and computer programming.
handart has allowed this dream to become a reality!
checkyourpass app - the night is yours !
a mobile application that lets you know if you can access the selected nightclub or not without moving.
check your pass is a family, close people who help themselves to build this project !
before launching the development of the app everything has been thought, every little detail : from the idea to the publication and of course all the way through the design of the project.

check your pass is the result of a group of united people who are passionate about new technologies, digital and the event sector who, with few resources, have decided not to just believe in their dreams but to realize them!
the road has been long and fraught with pitfalls but the obstacles are made to be overcome!
when the pandemic of covid 19 started some establishments had to close.
some of them even gave up their activity; but we didn’t !
our team check you pass kept going !
we have transformed what appeared a failure into a weapon against this virus.
this weapon would allow the world the world to go out without fear!
we explain it to you in the last paragraph.
i am part of the team and i can tell you that with cyp the phrase "whenever you want you can" has made perfect sense.
today the family must grow to be known by establishments and clubbers around the world, and for this we need your support!
check your pass is an app that is made to create a direct relationship between users and nightclubs.
in order to do this, the user sends a request to the club physionomist (?)
of his choice with the application's geolocation system that will make visible all nearby establishments within a radius of up to 100 km.
the night events will be displayed on the app at the time they start.
this information will be informed on the management platform made available to managers to be transcribed directly on the app.

the request for access to an evening is made by sending a maximum of one to three photos (+ a short video) taken at the t-time to validate the entry fee of customers before any potentially unnecessary move.
the physionomist accepts, or refuses, the request for access if the entry requirements are not respected.
the validation process is done in real time and takes only a few seconds.
the physionomist will also have specific access to the application, via a smartphone or tablet, in order to be able to manage the requests.
this app has many advantages for night clubs, for users (customers - potential customers) but also to compensate for the risk of contamination during the pandemic.
saving time :customers are put in direct contact with the physionomist via the app.
they just have to send a request to the physionomist and they will know straight away if they are allowed to enter the club or not.
controlling entries :the direct contact with the physionomist puts an end to the queues in front of the entrances, so physical distances and sanitary distances are respected.

in addition, this reduces the presence of noisy customers who hang out in front of the clubs and are responsible for noise and complaints from the neighborhood and thus force the establishments to close.
increasing safety :if a customer misbehaved in the past, the physionomist will be able to identify users through the listing of entries established in the application.
physionomists will therefore be able to anticipate potential disruptors before they even arrive in front of the entrances.

increasing visibility and turnover:the social media check your passusers will also be able to benefit from a social network as they will be able to post their photos, add friends, interact and chat via virtual messaging.
moreover, users will have at their disposal a news feed with the publications of evenings from around the world.
clubs will also be able to take advantage of this same news feed to inform users of their events, evenings and other news.

indeed with check your pass the establishments will be able to gain visibility and promote their evenings not only thanks to this news feed, thanks to the geolocation that will make the club visible by the entire community check your pass but also thanks to the function that allows users to share publications and evenings of establishments on all their networks (instagram snapchat facebook whatsap).
with check your pass the establishments benefit from a social network dedicated to the night life.

customers will no longer move unnecessarily but only if accepted by the establishment, they will no longer fear to be refused in front of the entrance which will encourage more customers to go out in clubs.
this application will be made available to users all over the world, it is available in all languages.

a platform will be made available to managers so that they can carry out the management of their establishments, they will have an overview of their entries, their turnover, their average basket and will also be able to organize their events, promote them, their advertising campaign, insert news.
everything will be transcribed directly on the application.

check your pass, a measure adapted to this covid context for the reopening of night clubs:remote entry management helps for physical and social distance and avoids unnecessary travel for customers, which reduces any risk of contamination during the way, as well as the risk of a virus carrier coming to an establishment and contaminating the entire line of waiting before they have even entered.
online payment avoids physical contact with staffan anti-covid cell is dedicated to cyp.
its purpose, to raise awareness about the risks of pandemics among all members of our social network.

for anyone declared infected with our cell, we will inform, thanks to our customer listing, all persons who participated in the same parties as the so-called contaminated, so that they can go to get tested and minimize the risk of pandemics after their loved ones.
a virtual quarantine system can also be set up with cyp to prohibit a contaminated person from entering a night establishment.
funding will allow us to improve the app and add new functions and expand globally.
join the checkyourpass family!

why put up with a phone case that's limited to protecting your smartphone when it could offer you so much more?
imagine a case that can mount and recharge your smartphone.
this reinvented case is called fonedrop.
it's a limitless case that protects, mounts and recharges your smartphone all in one.

we are mobseal, a subsidiary company of tablette store, a french company from the brittany region that has for several years been marketing tabdrop, a complete mobility solution for tablets aimed at professionals.

with more than 11,000 tablets fitted with our tabdrop solution, tablette store and mobseal have worked on the development of this concept, inspired by tabdrop, directly for smartphones and hence making it accessible to all.
this b2c project is called fonedrop.
fonedrop is a complete ecosystem that goes with you in your everyday life.
the pogo case is easy to fit to your smartphone and is made up of a magnetic system as well as pogo charging technology.
then you just need to dock your smartphone to the pogo cable charger to activate wireless charging.
to offer you complete flexibility, the pogo cable is installed on mounts for your car, your office or simply stick it to anything you want.

compatible devices : apple : 11 / 11 pro / 11 pro max / xs / xr / se 2020 / 8 / 7; samsung : a20 / a30 / a40 / a50 / a51 / a70 / s9 / s10e / s10 / s20; huawei : p20 / p20 pro / p30 / p30 pro. we continue to develop our product to offer other devices in the future.
our pogo cases are equipped with a dual layer which offers your smartphone maximum protection in case you drop it.
made of tough polycarbonate, it protects the external case from scratches and any direct impact.
the case interior is made of a soft material and is impressive in the way it absorbs the impact from shocks to your smartphone.
inspired, elegant design, the fonedrop case is equipped with a non-slip texture offering a grip that is both comfortable and reassuring.
the pogo magnetic plate with its original design is perfectly integrated into the back of the case and will not fail to make your friends curious.
the perfect alternative for any smartphones without induction, pogo technology offers wireless recharging.
fonedrop is compatible with fast charge (samsung) or quick charge so it allows you to charge your smartphone quickly while being kind to your battery.

it should be noted that, unlike induction, fonedrop pogo technology offers the additional advantage that you can transfer your data – that's very useful for exchanging content with your computer, and in your car it's perfect for making the most of android auto / apple carplay).
stress-free docking.
with fonedrop, you can simply lock on with just one gesture.
thanks to the magnetic mount in the pogo case, using a mount for your smartphone has never been so intuitive.
make the most of the accessories which are best suited to your environment.
fonedrop is fully compatible with vehicles equipped with android auto or apple carplay.
the pogo car-s is simple and effective, allowing you to make the most of all the options on your smartphone and all your vehicle's options in complete safety.
once you have attached and plugged the pogo case in to your smartphone, you will not need to remove it.
your charging port is then protected from any damage caused by mishandling.
need to recharge your smartphone without your pogo cable?
unplug the pogo case connector and recharge using a traditional cable.
slip your smartphone into the pogo case, plug the pogo case connector into the charging port.
that's all there is to it.
you will have fitted your fonedrop in just a few seconds.
the case protects your phone effectively against everyday accidents.
it offers you the advantages of pogo technology and the efficiency of its magnetic mount.
the pogo cable plugs into your original charger supplied with your smartphone.
as it is so small, you can take the pogo cable with you everywhere.
it comes with an adhesive disc that lets you attach the mount wherever you like.
your smartphone is ready to dock anywhere in an instant.
the pogo mount-t (or pogo telescopic mount) is the essential solution for your office.
its adhesive suction pad provides a solid mount while its telescopic arm is completely adjustable so you can keep an eye on all the alerts coming into your smartphone.
benefit from a new work screen to check your e-mails, keep an eye on your calls easily, and transfer your data to your computer all while you are charging the battery.
the pogo car-s (or pogo car-stabilized) is the ideal product to let you make the absolute most of fonedrop in your car.
the pogo car-s is securely installed on your vehicle's air vents via its mount brackets and two stabilizers.

fonedrop's magnetic system attaches your smartphone securely to the dashboardonce your smartphone is attach to fonedrop's magnetic system, pogo car-s will automaticly activate android auto or apple carplay so you can use all your apps while recharging your battery.

neon : 3d virtual reality sunglasses. holographic screen, connected sunglasses, augmented reality.
neon : holographic glasses without projector. "neon" are direct-display augmented reality (ar) glasses.

unlike other virtual reality glasses," neon" produces its image directly on the glass, which allows for a brighter and more contrasted image while reducing the clutter.this type of ar glasses allow a large field of vision (~ 90 °).
menu : images from the first prototype (the flickering effect is due to the video capture).
3d objet : images from the first prototype.
call : you can make and receive calls from your glasses.
music : you can select your titles from the glasses interface, manage the reading and the volume.
sms :  sms displays ; images from the first prototype.
stopwatch : oggers will appreciate the presence of a stopwatch. images from the first prototype.
the glasses work with a mobile application.
this one is still in development.
the app allows you to manage the settings of the glasses: the bluetooth connection, 3d, the route for the gps function, but also the weather function.
the system consists of an lcd panel (transparent).
this panel is crossed by the light coming from a rotating propeller located behind.
this serves as a backlight, it is composed of a row of leds and a polarizing filter.
the system is based on an lcd panel (transparent) surrounded by two propellers rotating in a synchronized manner.
the rear propeller is used for backlighting while the front one has a lens (in slice).
each of the propellers has a polarizing filter to allow the pixels of the screen to appear during the passage of the propellers.
if the screen displays black, the propeller will be opaque and the light will not reach the user's eye.

but if the screen is white, the light will pass from the rear propeller to the front propeller to reach the user's eye.we thus obtain a transparent screen which displays images with a certain focal length.
images from the first prototype.
state of development : the product is almost finished.
the demo images show the test prototype (the interface is not finished, this prototype does not display the final interface).
it therefore remains to complete the user interface.
the mechanism is completed but needs to be further improved to obtain a more stable, precise and contrasting image.
currently, the prototype is a simple technical demonstration but from which it is easy to quickly opt for a marketable product.

rewards : 3$ - receive all the information on the development; 30$ - receive all the information on the development as well as a t-shirt with the project logo; 200$ - receive all the information on the development as well as a copy of neon; 250$ - receive all development information as well as a pair of neon glasses (with your name engraved on the temples); 400$ - receive all development information as well as a two pair of neon glasses (with your name engraved on the temples)
the glasses are still at the prototype stage and can still evolve.
but no unexpected additions the prototype already works well but the look can still change to be the most discreet and minimalist possible.
shipping risk: the logistics involved with global shipping and warehousing are incredibly complicated, that’s why we intend to outsource this to experts.
supply chain risk: manufacturing can be unpredictable.
parts may be delayed, factories may receive incorrect components , new tariffs may be implemented without warning, and factory equipment can break slowing down the manufacturing line.
through all of the risks and challenges we face, we promise we’ll be transparent with any issues that come up and keep everyone posted on how and when they will be resolved.
thank you balloon project. a tribute balloon to celebrate the people we appreciate in our life, and a mission to fly gratitude all over the world.
thank you balloon project a non-profit tribute project with the support of flydoo | light sport balloons.
let's keep saying 'thank you'. our mission is to perpetuate and inspire gratitude by flying a balloon inscribed with your handwritten thank you notes over towns and cities all across the globe.
the thank you balloon project is not-for-profit, and aims to be the first ever crowdfunded hot air balloon.
doing this will spread positivity, kindness, and appreciation for all people.
thank you balloon project explained

why a 'thank you' balloon? inspired from the outpouring of love and gratitude during the covid-19 pandemic for essential workers, mike debellis, an american balloonist, and leandro corradini vega, a french balloon manufcaturer, decided to keep a good thing going... saying thank you loud and proud.
why? because expressing gratitude shouldn't just be said in times of struggles... saying thanks leads to respect, happiness, and is just the right thing to do always, and for everyone.
that's why you can write a thank you message to anyone you appreciate, not only essential workers!
the sight of countless thank you notes imprinted on a balloon will be inspiring - to say the least, and it will help us perpetuate happiness and thanks in a fun and unique way.
gratitude is contagious and we hope to fly it into the hearts of all who look up in awe at the tyb!
back the project by writing a thank you on the balloon!

you can support the thank you balloon project by first choosing which size you would like for your message, donating here on kickstarter, and then writing a thank you message to whoever you would like.
as a thank you from us, and aside from printing your message on the real balloon, we'll print a souvenir copy on balloon fabric and send it to you or your intended recipient! (See below!)
additionally, we'll take of picture of your note on the real thank you balloon and send it to you so you know where it is!
5 available sizes on the balloon for your thank you messages
there are 5 different spaces available on the balloon for you note: signature; flash thank you (20" x 6"); quarter panel (26"x 26"); half panel (63" x 26"); full panel (64" x 54") ;
all messages will be featured on the lower part of the balloon, which is the most visible part of the aircraft from the ground.
option 1. sign the thank you balloon ($17)
signatures are our entry-level perk for getting your personal touch over the thank you balloon.
this includes your handwritten signature, and the city and country information.

this perk does not include the shipping of a backer's certificate printed over balloon fabric, nor the possibility to print and address a thank you message on the balloon, but will still make you a part of this special project and you will get an hq picture showing your signature on the real balloon!
signatures will be located at the very bottom of the balloon, below the flash thank you messages.
option 2. write a flash thank you ($29)
the flash thank you messages are the lowest cost way to write a thank you note on the balloon! they are handwritten messages 20" x 6".
​this perk includes: digital hd photo of you message printed on the real balloon! ; backer's certificate ; copy of your message printed over balloon's fabric in a4 size.
option 3-5. quarter, half and full panel messages ($89 - $282)
did the people you want to thank make a difference in your life and deserve something really special?
are you a small business that would like thank your customers, staff, supporters?
this is the way to go! limited quantities available.
​this perk includes: digital hd photo of you message printed on the real balloon ;  backer's certificate ; copy of your message printed on balloon fabric
these spaces can accept any type of graphics/pictures/colors!
idea: why not join forces among friends or family members to get an entire panel all togetherfor the person or group of people you love!?
how to send us your message to be printed on the balloon : okay so you've decided on getting involved and would like to send us your message.

please follow the directions below to ensure your note gets to us correctly : back the project of the construction on the kickstarter by pledging at your desired involvement (thank you!) ;  type or handwrite the thank you message with black ink or thick marker on a blank piece of white paper (no lines) ; please keep it to 30 words or less and remember: the shorter, the bigger it will appear. scan or take a photo of the image. if taking a photo, please use a smartphone or better, and ensure there is good lighting ; to submit your picture, go to thankyouballoon.org/write-a-thank-you, and click submit thank you at the bottom. your message is now skybound!
the complete instructions can be found on our website here.

the thank you balloon usa tour with the help of numerous volunteer hot air balloon pilots and operators (pilots- learn more here!), we'll fly the thank you balloon across communities in the usa, inviting all people to absorb our unified message of gratitude.
we'll even take the t.y.b. to the largest festivals in the world, like international balloon fiesta in albuquerque (nm, usa) and grand est mondial in france in 2021.

in addition to standard morning and evening flights by the pilots during the tour, we'll bring the balloon to public places, like parking lots of hospitals, grocery stores, or schools - so that tyb's inspiring story and message can be experienced in real life by as many people as possible.
this will be done by partnering with key stakeholders in local communities to display the tribute balloon in safe and engaging way.
follow thank you balloon on it's journey : tyb’s message of thanks is meant to be shared!
the global public can tune into thank you balloon tv anytime via social media, along with www.thankyouballoon.org to track where in the world your message is.
the media team will diligently seek out tv appearances and remain active in the local and national press.
and you too, as member of the community supporting the tyb, can help on this task!
all our backers are invited to join us and see the balloon in the festivals we will fly at, or in any other venue we will announce.
we are looking for balloon pilots!
to our fellow private and commercial pilots, the thank you balloon offers a unique way to thank the local community that you fly in.
we believe it to be a special honor to fly the tyb and carry the torch of one thousand thank you notes.
additionally, you'll be pilot in command with next generation balloon technology onboard the traveling flydoo produced gondola and envelope.
flydoo engineers their balloons to be user friendly and highly transportable, focusing on the needs of sport and leisure pilots.
to apply and learn more, please visit www.thankyouballoon.org/for-pilots.
we are grateful for our pilots participation, without their commitment the balloon tour could not happen - thank you!

to give back, we have designed a specific "partner program" for commercial balloon operators that wish to fly the tyb, adhere to our mission by meeting some specific requirements like realizing a public inflation and contributing to spreading the message.
in exchange, operators can use the tyb for promoting their activity by sending out a new, fresh and engaging message to the public.
what is a flydoo? flydoos are ultralight super-compact hot air balloons for sport and leisure pilots, designed and manufactured in france.
a flydoo is the ideal balloon to take with you when travelling, for exploring the world from a higher perspective.
all flydoo gondolas are collapsible, light and portable, and the envelopes are basically half as heavy and big, once folded, compared to regular balloons of the same volume.
those advantages make it ideal to use a flydoo for a project like this, letting the tyb travel more economically to effectively spread the thank you message to the world!

the thank you balloon project staff : we are a group of highly passionate balloon pilots, crew and family members of first responders with years of experience building hot air balloons and flying them around the globe.
our 2 members who are volunteering the utmost amount of time and resources are : leandro corradini, founder of flydoo balloons (france); michael debellis, us operations and publicity (usa).
join us on our almost daily live streams. check on socials for daily timing, and prepare a #thankyoumessageoftheday to put in live comments so we can showcase it spread it live to the world!
at the end, this is what the tyb project is all about spreading thankfulness!
This is pretty easy. if we reach our funding goal, the balloon will be produced and will start its exciting journey of gratitude!
Circula Smart Ring Sleep, Energy, Performance. Evolved. 24/7 activity, sleep, and wellness monitoring with personalized recommendations, smart & silent alarm clock alerts with style.
circular is the smart ring that combines style with cutting edge technology to empower you to be more energetic and productive.
on the outside, circular is sleek, seamless, and discreet.
on the inside, it’s powered by advanced mechanical customization and intuitive ai.
when it comes to user experience, we’ve made no compromises.
the result? a seamless experience that works for you day & night.
can we introduce you to someone very special? Meet Kira.
she’s an integral part of the circular experience, and her whole goal is to make your life easier from helping you make improvements to letting you know when it’s time to step it up.
circular never sleeps, but you’ll sleep better.
that’s because what circular does best is synthesize and analyze your body signals (night and day!) for unique recommendations and advanced wellness correlations to improve your well-being.

circular tracks: while designing circular, our wish was to create a device that would assist us in responding to our body signals in a healthier way—helping us make optimal daily activity choices instead of just measuring the metrics.
with circular, you can learn about the effect of your sleep on your daily performance and the effect of your activities on the quality of your sleep and your future wellness.
everyone is unique, whether it is in terms of lifestyle, fitness, thoughts, choices, recovery, health, or sleep patterns.
circular's tracking features hold their true benefits in our cross-analysis.
day & night tracking combined enables us to deeply understand how the body reacts to events and what it needs.
we’ve spent a whole year working with sleep and activity specialists, doctors, and phd.
students to develop algorithms that effectively analyze your body signals in line with laboratory equipment.
the precision can only get better with time, making circular one of the most accurate and noninvasive tracking devices on the market.
get real-time, personalized recommendations.
control your ring, visualize your progress, meet (and compete with!)
your wellness community, and get impactful recommendations through the circular app.
we’re taking wearable tech to the next level by establishing baselines for users instead of just measuring metrics and spitting out raw data.
through the circular app, you’ll be able to: control your ring.
through the circular app, you’ll be able to: measure and visualize your progress through our sleep and activity scoring system.
through the circular app, you’ll be able to: meet (and compete with!) your fitness community.
when working out, we don’t want to wear a device made of precious gems; neither do we want to wear a plastic-looking device to an elegant event.
we believe that wearables should seamlessly blend into our everyday lives, and that’s exactly what circular does.
it’s scratch-resistant, water-resistant, and you can switch up your style to fit the occasion with interchangeable outer shells.
need a charge? connect on-the-go with our mobile charging solution.
the circular ring connects via bluetooth to your iphone or android device.
setting up the ring is as easy as downloading the app onto your phone, and all software updates are wirelessly transmitted to your circular ring.
built-in intelligence : we designed circular to be an effortless, autonomous part of your daily life.
there's no on/off button on the ring; it knows whether you are wearing it or not.
similarly, there's no need to notify the app nor the ring about what you are going to do.
circular knows when you go to sleep and when you do activities, and it uploads the subsequent data to your phone automatically.
if your phone is not available, it can collect and store detailed data for up to 7 days.
body signal processing  : the ring collects the body signals it needs using its dual sensors (heart rate sensor and accelerometer).
circular contains a built-in processor that will process the data and send it by bluetooth to the circular mobile app for analysis.
the circular app uses machine learning to better understand your habits and offer a personalized experience.

wave free during your sleep : although the 2400 mhz to 2485 mhz radiation output of a bluetooth device is negligible to your health, the circular ring automatically goes into “sleep mode” when it detects a sleeping state⁠—meaning that it is functioning without bluetooth during your sleep while still capturing your body signals.
it will synchronize with the app when you get up.
the sensors : a precise 3 axis accelerometer ; a red and infrared optical pulse sensor
having infrared leds means that there are no blinking lights on the ring to disturb your sleep because our eyes cannot see infrared wavelengths of light.
using circular is simple (so simple you basically don’t have to do anything).
here’s how it works

because of that, we can’t wear our wearables at any moment.
watches and bands are uncomfortable at night, so we don’t like to sleep with them.

because we don’t wear our wearables enough, the data can’t be used for advanced correlations.
this leads to poor user results and low material benefits that make us tire quickly of our wearables experience.
regarding the data, the output data is frequently either inaccurate or isn’t useful because the recommendations are not personalized.

Compose, Mix and Play from a single controller.
play melody with polyphonic expressivity, control multiple parameters for each single note, create harmony with simple chord arrangements and build complex rhythm patterns on a large screen.
all from the same music interface!
explore new gestures and new frontiers in multimedia and electronic music.
this is an animated gif.
give it time to loadthis multitouch pad makes the best use of the midi polyphonic expression (mpe) protocol.
this new midi norm goes deeper in velocity dynamics and is more accurate in microtonal variations.
granting faster information transmission between your daws and synths for easier mappings and routings.
rediscover your favorite synthesizers by triggering multiple effects at the same time with xyz/3d-pads, polyphonic aftertouch, released velocities or arpeggios effects.
all those features allow for true expressive and musical gestures such as glissando or portamentos, vibratos or pitch bends for every note you play.

create your own layout with simple elements from action keyboards and settings adjustment to rhythmics objects:erae touch has everything you would expect from a traditional midi controller and inherit from the innovation and new standard in the music industry.
continua by audio damage is packaged with the erae touch.
play multiple instruments on the same layout easy to play with, provided with advanced templates and quick menu access to optimize your workflow, it will become a central element in your music set.
split your layout to control several of your favorite vsts or synths without menu diving!
scale selection on the fly : retune and change scales dynamically with quick access by pressing the dedicated side button (f-clef button).
decide if you want to hide notes belonging to the scale or not, choose your key colour and select amongst 12 different scale modes (chromatic, major, minor, …).
never hit the wrong note unless you want to go chromatic or even microtonal!
grid based representation : this representation is becoming the new standard for expressive music controllers and is inspired by string instruments where each line is separated by a fourth.
it can be tuned into any isomorphic representation to help with deeper exploration of musical harmony and improvise with new musical ideas.
this note arrangement uses geometric patterns so your finger can play chords by simply shifting or gliding the shape along the playing surface like on a bowed instrument.
live controller : as heavy users of ableton lives ourselves, we thought this feature was mandatory.
we revised the classic launchpad navigation and made the best use of the continuous surface and display.
toggle clips in session view, record automations with high accuracy, quickly switch to mixer mode or perform with a specific instrument channel on the alt screen.

next level step sequencer : we did not forget all the electronic music nerds and developed a multi-track 64 step sequencer that will extend the possibilities with the integration of the mpe protocol applied to cc messages and after-touch.

browse your library of existing layouts or design your own interface with endless and evolving animations and settings.

the erae touch will also be the perfect tool for any artist using midi with mixed media and looking for more control from the backstage (audio 3d mixing, vjing, mapping, lighting, game engine …)our api will give access to the raw sensor data and direct control over the leds index and colors to be used from max/msp or object based languages.
this tool will also allow for quick prototyping from our team based on demands and needs.
giving the opportunity to develop more features such as specific arpeggios modes, auto-chords or more original features inspired by your favorite controllers!

who we are embodme saw the light after five years of research led by edgar hemery, now ceo of embodme and his encounter with mathieu frohlich cto and former engineer at squarp instrument.
the prototype for the erae touch was initially developed during edgar’s phd at the “mines de paris robotics lab”, one of france’s leading engineering schools.
the team grew rapidly, from 2018 onwards, to become the solid and interdisciplinary group it is today.
in the last two years embodme raised funds for their r&d needs, where co-incubated at agoranov and 104 factory in paris.
they were recently admitted to soundhub.dk, an accelerator based in denmark, who focus on innovative sound and music startups.
this resulted in the creation of a series of prototypes and test units with a strong industrialisation perspective in mind.
the team is now satisfied with the outcome and ready to launch: the erae touch is alive!
this fundraising campaign will give us the ability to finance the production, serving as a pre-sales step and offering a great platform to ship our product worldwide.
the kickstarter ecosystem will also give us the opportunity to reach a community of early adopters, supported by an online platform that is renowned and recognised internationally.
we took as many precautions as possible in every choices we have made in terms of industrialisation, but as one can never know, our defect rate could be worst than the worst we predict.
our providers all have <1% defect rate, however, electronic components can have pernicious effects: eg.

our last prototype had the right chips, but these latter had different boot loaders than the previous exact same chips, making firmware updates impossible via usb c. although we have identified as many faults potential defects, receiving a malfunctioning component could easily delay the whole process by 3-4 weeks.
we have taken these worst case scenarios into account in our timeline.
as i write this, our final prototype is already working and if the production goes as planned, you should receive the product before the announced date.
we produce goods integrating electrical components with eco-design at the heart of our design.the design of our products tends to limit power consumption and programmed obsolescence.
our product designer eliminated plastic parts, glues and solvent additives from the chart.
we made choices in our design that are in line with eco-design and reduce the number of parts to be assembled to three pieces.
we minimized the number of components from different manufacturers.
our product is simple to manufacture: a metal part, an electronic board with integrated sensors, a silicon surface, which "encapsulates" the metal chassis and the board.
again, there are no adhesives, solvents or plastic parts, which limits the production of the mould to one piece, the silicone surface.

it may seem this reduces the portability, but since this is a real instrument, which takes place on stage or in a studio, we prefer to opt for a low-power power adapter to a battery that has a limited life span.
reducing the environmental impact is essential in the face of a slight loss of portability, especially when the main advantage of the product is not to be nomadic and autonomous.
finally, we require our service providers to comply with standards and pay particular attention to the choice of materials.

the structure is young and our first product is not yet out, but we have the ambition to be iso 14001 certified, environmental management certification as soon as the company grows and we produce higher volumes.
des matières durableswe work with durable components with long life cycles and focus on replacing and repairing rather than throwing away.
as a result, our products are designed to last, just like the iconic synthesizers of the 1970s, which are still in use today.
all the components we use are made to last, all parts are repairable or individually replaceable.
the simplicity of assembly and disassembly allows users to make repairs themselves with our indications by sending them directly the part to be changed if it is not too complex.
we want to reduce the number of parcel post shipments as far as possible.
all you need is a screwdriver to open and close the unit and access the card.
in this respect, we draw inspiration from the first generation of sony walkman, whose design withstands all trials and tribulations, are repairable and for many, still work today.
the ram board (canceled) prototyping board with mikrobus sockets, programmed in c# using visual studio.
The ancestor : The MikroBus.Net RAM board is the worthy successor of our flagship board : The Quail.
this board is running netmf 4.4 on a stm32f4 mcu and is still alive.
it is built and sold by mikroelektronika (but you can find it on mouser's as well).
mbn quail (netmf 4.4)but despite its qualities, time has passed and it needed a complete renewal with the latest technologies available.
the successor : ram board. 4 mikrobus sockets were sometimes not enough to prototype some projects.
this time, we give you 6 sockets !
this should be enough for the most demanding projects.
mikrobus socket is an ever growing standard with more than 850 click boards available.
to drive such a huge number of sockets, we are now using a stm32h7 chip, powered by ghi tinyclr 2.0, a fast and secure os that brings a subset of .net framework to the embedded world.

here is a list of the hardware features available on the ram board : 6 mikrobus sockets, each one providing spi, i2c, pwm, analog in, uart and gpio ; usb and usb/serial debugging with visual studio ; up to 8mb for deployment ; 16mb flash on som (8 or 16 mb available) ; 32 mb of unmanaged memory (which can be assigned to the managed heap) ; sd/mmc card ; onboard ethernet ; usb host ; usb client ; rtc with cr2032 battery holder ; 256 mb (32 mb) onboard flash memory ; can support ; 3 onboard leds ; 24 gpio/spi/i2c/uart/power pins exposed via screw headers ; screw header for 7-36v external power supply ; powered by ghi sc20260e som
the board will be produced in the usa by ghi electronics llc, which will assure you of an irreproachable quality.

software : using ghi's sitcore module implies the use of tinyclr os, which gives access to many advanced features like : secure storage ; cryptography ; https ; mqtt ; sqllite ; power management (sleep, shutdown) ; and much more !
see this brochure for the complete list of features.
click boards : we already have a public github repository to host the drivers and example codes for nearly 90 modules so far.
and we add new drivers regularly.
here is a code sample to drive the ut-s-7seg click module
current statuswe are currently building a second, and probably last, prototype.
there were some flaws in the first one that have been fixed (power issues, external flash and serial debugging).
not much risks so far as the first prototype (the one in the video) is almost working as expected.
we are currently using that prototype to code new drivers, so it is perfectly functionnal.
as said in the current status section, only a few design flaws had been discovered and are fixed now.

Presentation of "Just Fun" : application to organize or join parties anytime and anywhere;what we call parties are as much a party at someone's house, as an afternoon playing basketball or football, you just have to download the application and organize parties by putting an address, schedule, number of people you want to bring and what they have to bring or not; then anyone on the application sees a map of the area around his home with the parties or activities that if found and can click on it to know the details of it and why not join it if the organizer accepts it.
with this application, you can organize parties as well as sports outings, a motorcycle ride or just a quiet spot at the beach to meet new people.
who are we? there are three of us so far behind this ambitious and complex project, one developer, and two graphic designers.
we got the idea after a holiday party where we don't really have anything to do and we want to have fun, except that the problem is that we knew people here; that's how we got the idea.
we are all three students in the south of france.
Presentation of the functionalities of the application : possibility to organize parties at your home or in a place planned for.
possibility to join parties available on the application if the organizer accepts your profile.
possibility to note the organizer of the party, its location, atmosphere or other parameters.
possibility to note the profiles that came to the party, whether he was nice or boring, flirtatious or friendly; or recommended or not.
possibility to give a tip to the organizer to reward his evening.
partnership with insurance to cover breakage, theft or damage to the body for party organizers.
master subscriptions to highlight his profile or his evening in the rankings.
rankings of the best parties, party organizers and guests.
what will the required budget be used for?

the requested budget will be used for the development of the application, for marketing, partnerships with insurance companies, security services, storage and web services, venues for parties, and to pay the people working on the project.
69,5k€ : if the 69,5k€ requested is reached, the application will start its development with its minimum budget and will be released early next summer.
100k€ : if the 100k€ is reached, the additional budget will be used to hire other developers and thus increase the quality and speed of development of the application.
200k€ : if the 200k€ is reached, the additional budget will be used to invest in partnerships with advertising companies, as well as reduced cost insurance for party organisers.
500k€ : if the 500k€ is reached, the application will organize at its release, a big party in a party room open to the whole world in all france.
1m€ : if the €1,000,000 is reached, the application will be developed worldwide after its release in france.
when's "just fun" coming out?
if the minimum amount of 69,5k€ is reached, the application will be published early next summer and will be in trial from july 07th to july 20th.
if no problem is found then the application will be in public for all france.
protect - safety first a wristband that can track your position and vitals.
can be used by parents to watch their children, as a group or distance monitoring.
a little boy kept running away from his mother and she was annoyed by it.
a little girl who was wearing her monitoring bracelet escaped because her mom's phone was not accessible.
so i noticed that it was very complicated for parents to supervise the children and therefore to enjoy the good time without danger.
an idea was born to find a product that will allow you to be quiet and cool on a beach or elsewhere, for every parent.
by analyzing this situation with my team we conclude that an active child wouldn't respect the maximum distance to constantly go out of view and too far away from his parents.
and as we know the child can't evaluate the real distance of 10-20 meters, because he doesn't really understand what it means.
and he needs some physical notification to understand that the max distance was exceeded.
another trouble is the water, because some children can play on the beach but for security reasons he has to stay away from the water.
in this case both the parent and children have to be notified of the danger.
our team analyzed the behavior of people, as well as existing products that perform similar functions, and we came to the conclusion that we need to create a new product.
one of the most logical solutions was the bracelet.
but it should be mobile phone independentand, user firendly, dust and water resistant, energy efficient, and really help the parent to control the child.

and finally we started to search for other applications of this technology and found that we can count the groups of the persons, can define the maximum security distance and notify the user on the different types of "problems" like drop, disconnection, distance, water, etc.
an extra application is the inverted usage of the same technology.
a usage for those people who need to respect the minimum social distancing like in the covid-19 case by physical notification.
our technology ensure the anonymous working of the device as it has no tracking module.

this device can also help some category of the people for the specific usage to be fast identified during its crisis situation (heart problem, mental problem, respiration problem, can be described just by the color on its band).
it is not a preventing or cure device, but just a possibility to indicate by flashing of the led the problem (might be started manually).
prototypes on charge, before the validation of the technology
it is important to use the most modern technology and make the product as easy to use as possible.
thus, we came to the decision to use ble technology, which includes both data transmission and distance detection and allows us to quickly respond to danger.
we decided to add a few more sensors to the band to cover the main critical situations that may arise when a child or adult is walking.
we conclude that our product can satisfy many people.
it has several main uses, but it can also have additional ones.
and that is more important the our product don't need any gps or internet !
that makes a big difference to other devices on market.
what it reacts to... the reaching the maximum permitted distance ; the falling of a person ; the contact with a water ; the signal loss ; the loss of the physical contact with a user

how does it react ? visually - bright flashing preset colors ; vibration - to take the user's attention even if he is not looking towards the bracelet ; sound - to take attention to the danger of surrounding users and identify the direction where the danger occurs ; a user can also send a complex sos signal, which is transmitted to all users of our device around him, and also sends a signal to the app on his phone to communicate a gps coordinates (taken from the phone gps module) to the "urgent contact list".
evolution : our product may change over time and be updated via the bluetooth module and mobile app.
by using the last electronic components we ensure the flexible usage of our product that can evaluate programmaticaly.
today we use a signal quality parameter paired with a specific tof (time of flight) algorithme to define the distance between 2 devices.
but in the future we will add a specific algorithme based on the working of the accelerometer and gyroscope sensor of each device to define the direction of the second device and not only the range.
of corse all updates are free and available for all users.

it answers to today's problems : one of the additional uses we are adding to our initial product today is to define the minimum allowed proximity distance notifier to help control the social distancing.

the main usages (options) of the iprotect band : family : parents walk with the child and do not want him to move away from them much (parc, entertainment resort, other) ; multiple children should not come close to the water (waterpool, lake, ocean) ; the child has poor balance, but must begin to walk ; multiple children should not exceed a certain distance

the main usages (options) of the iprotect band : groups : it is necessary to control the presence of all members of the group ; hiking trips ; groups with children ; groups of students ; groups of the same profession (firefighters, red cross, etc.) ; conference members ; on a hike, all members of the group should not diverge much, you can set the maximum distance ; it is necessary to identify all members of a group, firefighters, red cross, doctors, gatherings of philosophers or physicists;  identification on a date ; identification of the psychological state of a person (joyful, sad, ready for communication, ready for intimacy)

the main usages (options) of the iprotect band : social : approach warning at minimum distance for two or more bracelet users ; indication of the light notification in order to prevent the surrounding people in the case of a medical crisis (start is manual by a person in crisis and just alerting the surrounding people about about the problem, but can’t cure or prevent it)
one of the usage of the iprotect band
an iprotect band can be used with only one option (social or family or group), or multiple options (ex.: social + family) working at the same time.

already done [since sept.2019 when the idea was born] : checking the technical feasibility of the project, we were helped by the french technology company ; research of the market and behavioral models of people to understand in what situations they need our product ; prototyping the mechanical part of the band (for initial tests) ; prototyping the electronic part of the band (pcba) ; analysis of the microcontroller functions and radio communication module (bluetooth) possibilities ; selection of pico power electronic components to extend the work time of the band ; creation of a 10 prototypes of the band for the validation of the used technology * carrying out the first drop tests, exceeding the permissible distance ; international protection of invention by a patent and 4 copyrights
short video of the test of the max range notification
short video of the test of the social distancing notification

what will we do next : final testing (water contact, human body contact, loss of signal) ; writing a firmware that contains all the necessary parts of communication between bracelets and between the bracelet and the application ; validation of the final design of the bracelet ; checking the optical properties of the transparent cover of the band, to ensure the maximum visibility of the light signal ; passing the international certification ; production of the first batch to be sent to the contributors ; mass production

specification : ble (bluetooth low energy) last generation technology ; microprocessor 32 bit ; drop sensor ; motion sensor ; water sensor ; human body presence detector ; working range from 1 to 100 meters by defined step according to the usage ; work indoors and outdoors ;  autonomy up to 2 months in standby mode / 1..3 weeks in working mode (depends on type usage)
colors : 7 colors are available! white , black , aqua blue , shamrock green , cherry red , bumblebee yellow , orchid purple

zef : comfort for your disposable masks. we have developped a miniaturized and ultra light breathing assistance module that can be mounted in any surgical mask.
unfold your mask, slide it inside your disposable surgical mask or homemade cloth mask, switch it on, and breathe.
completely silent, it helps reduce headaches, moisture, foggy glasses and itchy skin.
being in public transportation, at work or while shopping, zef will provide you with fresh air while your mask protects you and others from contamination.
with its ergonomic design, tight dimensions and lightweight, it can follow you everywhere!
its geometry and mounting system ensure a tight fit and increase space in front of your mouth, thereby facilitating speech, your lips won’t touch your mask anymore.
its battery can last over 4 hours and it only takes 30 minutes to recharge it on a standard usb port.
the build of several prototypes enabled us to prove feasibility and performance of zef.
zef is placed directly inside your disposable mask or homemade cloth mask.
it is secured in position by the two flexible strips inserted inside the lower fold of your mask.
it will then find its natural position under your mouth and generates a gentle airflow inside.
this patent pending solution provides a very secure mouting inside the mask.
moreover, placed inside, zef does not deteriorate the filtration quality provided by your mask and stays out of external contamination.
the casing is made out of recycled material and since there is no disposable filter, zef does not create additional waste and can be used for more than 2000 hours.

our prototypes proved that zef can be worn for extensively long hours at work: in the medical field, grocery stores, public transportation, and even physical work for which mask protection is mandatory.
the results are outstanding: no more headache at the end of the day.
from the begining, it was important for us to include in our actions a way to help people fighting the current health crisis on the field.

that's the reason why we included in our free stretch goals a number of zef distributed free of charge to medical staff : nurses, doctors... for each stretch goal reached, we'll increase the number of zef offered!
we believe we developed an awesome product that can help many people in their daily life by removing discomfort that wearing a mask ensues.
by using a platform like kickstarter, it is, for us, the best way to reach as many pledgers as possible in a short timeframe, because, now is the time of need.
these kickstarter pledges will help us fund tooling to produce zef quickly at a competitive price and everyone will soon be able to breathe freely in their disposable masks.
none of this would be possible without kickstarter supporters.
