meme : social network for memers. an android and ios app, allowing memers to share their creations and get paid for that.
seeing ads under some very funny content.
i realized that content/meme creators are not rewarded for what they make.
they're driven by the fact that they make people laugh, and they earn internet points for this.
but they are in fact creators, and deserve recognition and rewards for their content.
that's why today i am making this app.
dedicated to memes or any funny content, centered on creators, and their interactions with users.
it's basically a social network for memers and entertainers !
a post can be upvoted, downvoted, commented, or "i laughted".
creators will be paid depending on users interactions with their content, (just like video platforms pay their content creators).
90% of ad revenue made with creators posts will be reversed to them.

the app will be built with 4 major views : home view, here you will see posts from users you are subscribed to; tendencies view, time and popularity based posts (hot, new, rising, etc) ; browse view, here you'll be able to search for specific content or users, or if you have no idea, recommendations based on what you like; random view, well this is random !
the ad format : nobody like ads, i know that.
That's why "You! MeMe" won't be flooded with it.

ads will be shown in 3 ways : 1) when upvoting a post, you will see it expand, say "thank you" and show you an ad. e.g :not expanded/upvoted post, expanded/upvoted post. 2) after clicking on "i laughed" (which is in fact a "support creator" button), you will be shown a full screen skipable ad video. 3) after accessing a post details (comments, description, etc).
however, an algorithm calculate the ad positions so 2 ads will never be printed on the same screen.
so even if you upvote 3-4 posts in a row, you won't see 3 ads in line.

original content : i know for a fact a lot of memes are stolen, that's why you will be able to chose if your content is : shareable : the whole post, just the content, or nothing ; captureable : screenshots will be disabled on post that are not captureable; reposteable : a functionality will allow users to repost while featuring the creator, but only with his consent.
subscriber based : users will be able to subscribe to each others, just like many social medias.
so your main feed will be filled from your subscriptions.
creators will also be recommended to users that might like them.
this way we'll ensure memers will be able to create a community around them.
user profile
who am i ? hello there ! i am one of those who upvote but don't post.
i am a 22 years old french student working towards a master's degree in automation and energies.
i am also a dreamer who wants to build binding between people.
why this budget ? for the whole project to work i'll need to buy hardware (phones to test on, macbook to developp on ios).
for conveniance and useability on all platforms, the app will be running on firebase servers, which get quite expensive as the amount of users get higher.
also for everything to be legal i'll have to create a llc and commit capital to it.
i'll also have to pay for a web designer to create dedicated artworks and icons.
and a web developper to create dedicated apis.
the goal : i truely want creators to gain something for the time passed making memes, and users that just want to see good memes to be able to enjoy the content while knowing it rewards creators.
i believe memes are a new form of culture and expression which deserve recognition.
moreover, i also believe memers are some kind of artists and should be distinguished for the quality of their creations.
hope you will be as exited as i am. Let's MeMe, You! MeMe.
bring the different actors together.
set up a team of designers and web developers to create a robust and future-proof platform.
facilitate interactions between memers by bringing them together on the same support dedicated to memes.
since data storage is the most polluting factor in the world, limit the storage and exchange of unnecessary data.
Discoboard for Ninebot MAX G30. A LED light board for e-scooter / Ninebot KickScooter MAX G30, G30P and G30D.
the idea : as a happy owner of a kickscooter max g30, i was surprised to find that ninebot's flagship model did not have ambient led lights at the bottom of the chassis like its competing models.
during the quarantine, i came up with a solution by creating a translucent part with led strips that replaces the original “battery cover”.
after several dozen hours spent looking for the right components, taking measurements and creating a 3d model, the prototype was finally ready to be printed, assembled, and mounted on my e-scooter.
bottom view of my ninebot kickscooter max g30 with the discoboard prototype

the finished product exceeded my expectations and i was floored by the enthusiastic feedback: i have already tested a second prototype for a friend and i am regularly bombarded with excited inquiries at the red light about my strange ninebot max!
all of these positive responses led to the idea to turn my fun project into a product that others can also enjoy!
discoboard : discoboard allows you to assert your style while increasing your visibility for a smooth ride.
assert your style
plug and play : discoboard's setup is easy and takes less than 10 minutes.
it replaces the original "battery cover" and simply plugs into your scooter’s controller.

therefore, its installation does not require any destructive or irreversible operation on your scooter (no drilling, no gluing, no welding, etc.) and it does not result in the breaking of your scooter’s warranty seal.
discoboard simply plugs in

connected : discoboard can be controlled via bluetooth using an intuitive mobile application (ios and android) allowing you to choose your style among many static colors and 120 customizable light effects in terms of speed and intensity.
discoboard is connected
low-energy : discoboard turns on and off with the e-scooter, consumes only 10w maximum—which won’t impact your battery life—and does not require the addition of a seperate battery to power it.
discoboard turns on and off with the scooter
fully compatible : discoboard adapts perfectly to the scooter.
it maintains a streamline design that doesn’t add unnecessary bulk or weight, and prevents the increased risk of friction with obstacles (curbs, speed bumps, etc.).
exterior view of the original "battery cover" and the discoboard prototype
interior view of the original "battery cover" and the discoboard prototype
waterproof and durable : discoboard is made of a durable polycarbonate material (commonly used for vehicle headlights) chosen for its strength and resistance to water and uv rays.
the discoboard’s foam seal keeps the scooter waterproof and its leds have a lifespan of over 50,000 hours!
discoboard is waterproof

easy to clean :  discoboard can be washed with a simple damp sponge, and features a perfectly smooth surface for easy cleaning, unlike the original "battery cover" surface which frequently traps dirt and grime.
discoboard is easy to clean
the prototype : the prototype presented was modeled in 3d and printed in 2 parts in translucent petg.
3d modeling of discoboard
the discoboard prototype incorporates 2 strips, each with 20 rgb leds.
this is powered directly by your scooter’s controller and can be operated via bluetooth through a mobile application.
discoboard has a foam seal surrounding its edges, which allows the scooter to remain waterproof.
industrialization : the manufacturing of discoboard requires moving from 3d printing (used to make the prototype) to thermoplastic injection molding, in order to create a mold.
the plastic chosen for the injection is iupilon s-3001r, a perfectly transparentpolycarbonate, with a “frosted” finish on the exterior faces.
unlike the prototype, the delivered version will be in a single part, without the “embossed” of the 3d printing infill pattern.
iupilon s-3001r sample
simulation of piece filling
its industrialization also requires the manufacturing of custom cables, whereas they needed to be crimped manually for the prototype.
the cost : the cost of the project for the realization of the first 200 units is approximately €20,000, broken down as follows.
the assembly will be done by myself (and a few friends), which is why no assembly costs have been taken into account.
in addition, my financial participation of 50% of the cost of the project will reduce the kickstarter funding target to €10,000.
I count on your support!
the delivery : as soon as the kickstarter campaign ends, the manufacturing of the mold will be launched and the orders will be placed with the various suppliers.
the time required for receipt of the various components and their assembly should not exceed one month.
shipments will be made worldwide at the rate of a batch of 100 units per week, with a first shipment estimated for the week of december 14, 2020.
early adopters can therefore expect their discoboard to be delivered to them before christmas.
this project does not involve any particular risk: the suppliers are identified, the cost and the delivery time are known for each component.
the switch from 3d printing to thermoplastic injection requires only a few minor modifications to the model.

the biggest challenge therefore remains to reach the objective, the number of ninebot max g30 in circulation still remaining much lower than that of its small cousin, the market leader, the xiaomi m365.
docprotocol - a medical app for doctors and their teams. better care for patients by facilitating the sharing of knowledge and documents between doctors and their teams.

Hello, I'm Dr. Matthieu Marchetti, a French ER doctor. i'm passionate about new technologies and i am convinced that improving patients care requires improving new technologies and making them available to as many people as possible.
i need your help to create an application that will be in all the white coats pockets.

its aim will be to allow doctors and their medical teams to easily share professionals documents : emergency protocols, check-lists, medical recommendations... between them, and with other teams, in other hospitals.
i work in the er for years, and i can say that this kind of tool is still missing in 2020 !
i'm passionate, but unfortunately i don't have the skills to develop an app by myself.
so i need you to help me to hire a professional developer !
a team of app developers is already fully motivated to start the project.
my largest challenge is to build a strong community of doctors, nurses, medical students.

HONEST | A Real French Dating App
Do not forget to activate the Subtitles available for the presentation video.
I am sorry if some part of our presentation is incorrectly translated. I tried to translate this as best I could.
yoram and i are currently developing a dating application called honest, which will connect users with (necessarily) common affinities and aversions.
the choices of affinities and aversions offered will be numerous and diverse, in order to offer a user experience as complete and satisfactory as possible.

concretely, different so-called “general” categories such as (sport, music, film / series, animals, art, reading, singers, actors, culture, studies, manga, philosophy, video games and many more) will be available to you.
disposition ; each of these general categories will include a multitude of choices that will allow you to define precisely what you like and what you don't like.
anonymity will have an important place at honest.
your profile photos will not be revealed at first.
to have access to the profile pictures of your matches, a condition must be fulfilled.

when you have matched with one of the profiles that have been suggested to you and after starting to chat with your match, you will have to exchange a minimum number of messages in order to unblock your profile photos.
this makes it possible to remedy the absence of discussion, which is unfortunately too present in other dating applications.
rest assured! we take into account the physical criterion but as specified above, we put it in the background; although it is of importance not to be overlooked.
after unlocking the photos, you will also unlock the function that will allow you to end your match if you wish.
in the event that your match does not respond to you and that within a given time, the function to end the match will be unlocked by itself.
let's be honest, even if certain affinities and aversions are shared, it is important to understand that each of us has physical criteria that we are looking for.
this is a question you can ask yourself.
before giving you the answer (to this question) we must make a point on the dating applications that currently exist.

take for example a top 5 of the most used dating applications today (not to degrade the image of these we will change their name):so we have dinder which is the most used currently, followed by meeclick, then baloo, and finally hapneu for example.
the problem with this kind of application is the profile suggestion mode.

the latter takes into account only certain criteria such as (age, gender and distance), and thereafter, the choice of profiles that we like, will be made solely on the physical appearance of the latter.
to illustrate my point, i will present this to you in an analogy, which my brother was able to transmit to me during the long discussions that we were able to have on these applications.
“when you choose a car, you look for the essential criteria first, right? (petrol? diesel? 3 seater? 5 seater? price? etc ...)

then according to these criteria you will have a limited choice but which will suit what you are looking for, and at that time, you will be able to choose according to appearance the car which attracts you the most. "
i guess the vast majority of people who read this and own a car will agree with this reasoning.
and yet what these different apps offer us is the opposite of that.
we only match on the physical hoping, behind finding a person who shares points in common with us.
it's a bit like the lotto, we let luck and chance do the rest ...
so as we are "sorted" mainly on our appearance, we use devices that allow us to have the best (s) profile photo (s) in order to attract as many matches as possible.
when i speak of artifices, i am talking about means that allow us to divert reality from our physics (filters, retouching, photos dating back a few years earlier, etc.).
and when the time comes to meet this person who presumably corresponded to our expectations on the physical level, strangely she did not resemble in all respects what her photos showed you of her.
there is clearly a lack of honesty fueled by these applications, which put millions of users in competition, creating this "vicious circle".
we hide our true appearance for fear of not being "good looking" enough to be matched and therefore desired.
to remedy this, (and allow total honesty on your part), each user will have a “main photo”.

this photo will be representative of your person and cannot be imported; it will be taken via the honest “camera” function, in order to guarantee a photo that has not been retouched or modified by filters.
this will not prevent you, of course, from getting ready for this photo (makeup, hairstyle, matching clothes, etc ...); the goal being that each user shows himself to be "natural".
this photo will be proof of your honesty and will put all users on the same level.
this main photo will be the first photo visible on your profile, however for the other profile photos (secondary photos), we leave it to you to import them.
the purpose of all of this is not to force you but to share a part of you naturally.
each user profile will include 3 tabs : first the affinities (i like), then the dislikes (i don't like).
and finally its description and personality; the latter will include a few sentences that will allow him to briefly introduce himself, as well as different keywords, which will detail his person.
honest will above all offer an experience based on the principle of serious dating.
although we don't set users aside for more fleeting relationships.
note that the profiles that will be offered to you, in addition to sharing tastes with you, will necessarily seek the same type of relationship as you.
you will be able to change your choice as to the type of relationship sought.
note that once this choice is made, you will have to wait 7 days before you can make a new change.
we have implemented this 7-day period in order to limit any abuse on the part of certain users who change their search choices too regularly.
or even who would take advantage of this to harm the experience of other users.
depending on the type of relationship you choose, different rules will apply.
you can only accumulate 4 games at a time.
(this will not prevent you from accessing profile suggestions).
when a match location is released, the next match that was pending will appear and take the place of the previously released location.
in conclusion :if you choose serious relationships and this choice is sincere and honest, you agree to show yourself in your true nature.
you are not there to accumulate a maximum of matches, and you want above all to meet a person first on criteria of affinities then on physical criteria.

if you choose transient relationships and this choice is sincere and honest, you accept that the profiles which will be proposed to you can use artifices in order to modify their (true) physical appearance.
you are looking to maximize the number of matches, you want to meet a person above all on physical criteria then on affinity criteria.
important ! note that whatever choice of relationship you seek, the profiles offered will always have a minimum number of points in common with you!
in short honest will be an application open to anyone honest about their expectations, their tastes and their person!
respect for others will obviously be of paramount value.

via our identity verification system when you create your account, we will limit as much as possible false accounts, identity theft, scams, which are unfortunately far too present on dating applications and harm the user experience.
honest will be created on a freemium model, that is to say that the vast majority of features will be free to access, although some will require a premium account.

the features that can be unlocked / unlocked will be: (the favorite // the booster // the undoo // who liked me?) this does not mean that these will not be available for non-premium users, only certain limitations of use may apply.
honest will offer various functionalities, some already used in classic dating applications and some innovative:
it all started 5 months ago, i was chatting with yoram (who is currently the developer of honest), the latter asked me a simple question that was going to have an impact on me for the months to come.
Hugo? Have you ever been on Dinder?
yes like many people i suppose.
and how does it work? how it works?

basically, you create your profile with your photos, you choose what kind of people you want to meet, man or / and woman, you can also choose your search radius (for example between 0 and 30 km from your position) and finally the age group you want.
after according to your criteria, dinder will offer you matching profiles.
and you've been on it for a long time?
humm about 6/7 months, well since i was single what ...
have you met people?
currently only one, and it hasn't gone further than that.
why not more people than that?
who knows, i may not have the good face, or i may not be interesting enough for them.
so you would say it works well as a dating app?
honestly, i think not, there is a big problem in this kind of application.
everything is played on the physical.
so you didn't have matches?
if i had on the contrary.
how many per day?
about 2 or 3 per day.
and you only met one person?

yes…, you see the thing is that it doesn't guarantee anything, often the people you match with, either: (1) do not respond. (2) speak very little and seem almost drunk as you speak to them. (3) or the conversation runs out of steam very quickly because there is nothing in common.
i don't understand ..., if it doesn't work why so many people are on it?
it's simple because anyone wants to know if it is desirable or not, and nothing better than receiving a match notification to reassure yourself and say: "yessss! i'm desirable, i was matched. "
ultimately the experience ends there, after there are exceptions.
if you are super handsome or beautiful, you will accumulate a maximum of matches and appointments.
so dinder is primarily for sexdating ?
officially it's not sold like that, but unofficially i would say yes.
it's interesting that you broached the subject of dinder, because i don't know if you knew it, but each profile would have a hidden note, which would make you match with profiles with a similar note.
we would call this note, “desirability note”, so users would dangle profiles with a note above theirs, but they would never match with them...
ah yes!? but it would be unhealthy.
indeed and not very honest as a way of proceeding.
you know, man, here i am towards the end of my studies and i would really like to create an application.
quite frankly, in addition you just raised a lot of problems and for each problem there are solutions!
do you think there is a way to create a whole new type of dating app you think?
nothing is impossible! we will have to take time, think about the things that do not work and what to replace them with.
following this discussion we started to think about a whole new type of dating app.
we have listed those that already exist, grouped the similarities in their functioning and their faults.

the first 2 months consisted above all in establishing the functioning of honest:who do we want to have as users: single? what type of relationship? serious? how will the match system work?  what features to put? etc ...
once that was established, we took a few weeks to create the specifications.
the latter brings together the description of the project, our direct competitors, the user journey, the resources required to create such an application.
then, before we started developing, we had to create something called a mockup.
a mockup is a "mockup", it allows you to create a basic visual of the application with scripted interactions to navigate it.

thanks to this last one i was able to establish a graphic charter (i took it over on numerous occasions and it will surely still evolve thereafter), optimize the user experience ux (user experience it consists in ergonomics navigation in the application).
by combining the graphic charter and the ux, we have worked on the ui (user interface) which will be closer to the appearance of interface design.
in parallel to this, i created the honest site (which is currently a temporary site and which will be recreated and improved if honest is funded).
several months have passed since my discussion with yoram, then came the time to plan our kickstarter campaign.
so i worked for over a month and a half on the introductory video you probably watched.
it took me a lot of time, i had to continually learn different ways to animate and convey the message i wanted to share with you.
added to this is the composition of the music accompanying the video; not wanting to be bothered by copyright, i had to compose it myself.
once that is done we come to the moment when i write this sentence, that is to say the creation of our kickstarter campaign.
add in addition the creation of a facebook page and a twitter (it was quite fast).

here is the process of creating honest: initial discussion on dating applications; brainstorming with yoram ; creation of specifications ; creation of the mockup ; creation of the website ; creation of the video for the kickstarter campaign, as well as music ; creation of the facebook page and twitter ;  wrote the kickstarter campaign.
we are currently a team of 2 people, yoram and me: yoram is the developer of honest, he was responsible for creating the alpha version.
he will be responsible for developing the beta version as well as the final version.
having already developed several applications, i have full confidence in him and his advice.
Me : i'm a bit of the swiss army knife!

i was responsible for developing the specifications, creating the mockup, the basic ui / ux design, the graphic charter, the website, the facebook page, the twitter, the promotional video, the development of the kickstarter campaign, the communication campaign to come.
of course the team is not complete, it will be if we manage to raise the funds necessary to create honest.

if you are a ui / ux designer / developer / community manager and you are interested in our project, you can contact us by email via the following address: application.honest@gmail.com, so that we can discuss of a possible collaboration.
we are very aware that this amount is very important!
it includes several costs necessary for the creation of honest such as:development: € 20,000 to enable honest to be present on ios, android, tablet and computer.
design and interface (ux / ui): € 4,000the communication campaign on social networks, youtube, facebook, instagram over a period of 5 months: € 12,000.
as explained above, this step will make honest known and will guarantee optimal functioning.
the servers, which will be used to host honest and its users, as well as the storage and processing of data: € 200 / month, or € 1,200 for 6 months.
honest's patent: € 500
if we add up all these costs, the total amount would be € 37,770.
so yes there is a significant difference between € 58,812 and € 37,770, what do these missing € 21,042 correspond to?
the different taxes which are added : kickstarter takes 5% for any successful fundraising campaign: € 1,885; payment processing fees from kickstarter which estimates these at 5%: € 1,885.
and finally the margin of error estimated by kickstarter equivalent to 10% of the gross amount (€ 37,770) therefore an amount of € 3,770.
residing in france, i will be taxed on income taxes, this tax will amount to 30% of € 45,240 or an amount of: € 13,572.
creating honest is above all a challenge and any challenge comes with risks and challenges to overcome.

first, for the creation of a dating application, the biggest challenge is to reach a large number of users so that the profile suggestion system is optimal, and that it can offer a sufficient number of different profile every day.
then the question we have to ask ourselves is : will the mode of operation of honest (search by affinities and aversions) please users of more classic dating application?
third, we will have to anticipate the human factor.
in a lot of dating apps, there are a lot of bogus accounts, scams, free badness, and a lot more negative stuff.
for our part we will be uncompromising.
we want to have a community made up of people respectful of others, and this as much as possible.
if a user is reported several times, our team will analyze his profile and can ban him permanently if necessary (i.e.
even if he wants to recreate a new account, via a new phone number, honest will block his access all the same, by blocking not his phone number, but the phone itself!)
to conclude the last risk that can be present in any creation of a project, is the delay.
the unexpected may delay us and therefore delay the release of honest by a few weeks.
we will try as much as possible to plan these in order to meet our deadlines.
overall, honest's challenge is above all a challenge on social behavior.
it is a project that carries strong values, and although a large part of our society shares them, some do not feel concerned.
anyma phi - physical modelling synthesizer by aodyo : play amazing sounds and effects using advanced physical modelling technology in a compact, affordable package
play amazing sounds and effects using advanced physical modelling technology in a compact, affordable packagepre order.
an affordable hybrid monophonic synthesizer that allows you to create new sound universes inspired from the real world, where objects collide, vibrate, and resonate.

anyma phi blends the classic ingredients of electronic music with physical modelling technology, allowing it to simulate acoustic sound sources, such as strings or reeds, as well as resonating structures, like wood, glass, or metal.

anyma phi is compact enough to stand on your keyboard, or anywhere on your desk, and is compatible with any midi controller, such as keyboards, sequencers, or even wind controllers, including our own sylphyo.
whether you play live or record in the studio, design sounds or play presets, anyma phi will become an indispensable tool.
it can even be used as a stand-alone effects processor, or as part of a guitar effects pedal setup.

the heart of the anyma phi is the matrix, which provides a quick and easy way to explore your sounds by following a physical metaphor, with four macros for each of the five stages of sound generation:
with its matrix, anyma phi offers a straightforward way to tweak, explore, and create sound universes.
it also provides easy ways to make your sound react to your midi controllers with mapping shortcuts.
but don't be fooled by the simplicity!
if you want to dive deeper, you can take control of the powerful semi-modular synth engine beyond the matrix, with oscillators covering a wide range of synthesis techniques, effects, and modulators.
by connecting those together, you can create any kind of sound, and control it any way you want.
anyma phi offers you:
this amounts to 69 different module types available, including 30 sources, 22 effects, and 17 modulators.
a more detailed list of modules is available here.
where it all started... with her kind permission, many of the available sound sources were inspired by emilie gillet's fantastic work on mutable instruments modules. huge thanks!

technical specifications : hybrid monophonic synthesizer ; stereo audio output: - two 1/4” mono line jack outputs - one 1/4” stereo headphone jack output ; stereo audio input: one 1/4” stereo input ; midi inputs and outputs via usb and din ports ; powerful digital semi-modular synthesizer engine (module list) - memory: 63 patches - 3 oscillator slots - 5 effect slots + 1 mono reverb - 2 audio buses for mixing and effect assignation - 8 modulator slots, including dahdsr envelope generators, lfos, curves, interpolators, slew limiters, etc. 24 mapping slots (virtual patch cords), each allowing to control any synth parameter (including another mapping) using a modulator or a controller input, with a sidechain input.
technical specifications subject to change in order to improve reliability, function, or design.
as more contributors come in, there will be an opportunity to reach some of the stretch goals, which will benefit all existing and future contributors to the campaign, for free!
the percussive playing surface will allow you to tap and scratch your sounds directly on the case, making your performance even more expressive and fun!
this would be made possible by integrating a piezoelectric contact microphone into the case.
the resulting sound would be available to use on the anyma as an audio input, ready to be fed into resonators and effects!
check out the piezo percs demo on soundcloud for another example!
you can edit patches directly on your anyma, as well as send and receive patches via midi sysex.
but what about something more comfortable and powerful?

this software will allow you to easily manage and share patches, as well as edit them in depth in a streamlined environment on your pc or mac, by making all the synth components directly visible and showing their interactions.
our current prototype of the anyma phi has room for 63 patches, which is nice, but having more is always better!

with more memory, you can have a huge library of sounds at your fingertips, or you can make many variations of your patches without having to worry about space or having the computer editor around to make backups!
we would extend the memory of the anyma phi to reach up to hundreds of patches (the actual amount is to be determined).
let's free the anyma phi from the shackles of the western 12-tone equal temperament!
with microtuning support, you will be able to use any scale or tuning, be it to play eastern music or to explore new harmonic universes.
the editor will allow you to load scala (.scl) or anamark (.tun) files into the anyma phi, which will also directly respond to midi tuning standard (mts) messages.
future stretch goals
hello, we are aodyo instruments!
we're a team of 7 people based in lille, in the north of france, and we are all committed to bringing to musicians new possibilities to give life to their sounds.
five years ago, we created an electronic wind instrument inspired by acoustic woodwinds, the sylphyo, which offers new and exciting ways to play synth sounds.

for our next project, we decided it was time for synths too to take a hint from the real world, and we're very excited to announce anyma phi, an affordable way to add original, reactive acoustically-inspired sounds to the toolbox of every musician.
please join us on our social media and our forum to spread the news and discuss with others!
thank you so much for your help and support!
we are so happy that you are joining us in making this possible.
musically, aodyo instruments team, laurent, ludovic, jonathan, romain, matthias, maria, and maxence. we have been making electronic musical instruments in a professional capacity since 2015.
our partners in europe have been working in the industry for years before us.
and together, we are confident in our ability to deliver a product of the best quality possible to fulfill our commitment to our customers.
as you can see in the videos, our prototypes are already functional and the sound engine has undergone thorough testing.
we still need to polish anyma phi to make it ready for musicians, and we need your help to fund the final software development and production phase.
we’re thrilled to include you in the process with us: you’ll get to know all the news, good or bad, regarding the progress of the project.

with the covid-19 pandemic looming above every project, we feel it is important to stress that, due in part to our commitment to local manufacturing, we are likely to be able to mitigate a lot of the issues associated with manufacturing in other countries during such times.
however, there are still risks associated with the current pandemic, which include delayed production as well as shipping.
our instruments are designed and built for the long-term.

in addition, we will continue to offer lifetime support and updates to our instruments, as our track record proves with the sylphyo, which was released five years ago, and still receives software updates even for the first models.

we try to reduce our impact on the planet as much as possible by using as little plastic as possible in our packaging, and make our gift and shipping boxes from recycled/recyclable cardboard when possible.
every instrument we make is manufactured locally in france with respect for local labor laws.
we believe in producing locally, which gives us both greater control over the production as well as a decreased environmental footprint.
we also assemble and test all instruments by hand in our workshop located in france.

callipeg - animation ipad app. we are 2d animation lovers and we want to develop professional tools for ipad users.
With the iPad and Apple Pencil came a variety of apps for drawing, photo edition, video editing and animation.
but we found out that the animation apps weren’t fully taking advantage of the ipad powerful specs and there were missing features to match professional needs.
the callipeg team is made of four people: a developer, an animator, a head of sales and a head of communication.
we decided to merge our love for animation and our knowledge in imagery software development to create callipeg.
what is callipeg? callipeg is a 2d animation app for your ipad which proposes professional animation tools complying with ios ergonomics and design.
everything is thought for the apple pencil and gestures from the drawing tools to the timeline and flip.
current state of developmentcallipeg has been in beta-testing and full-time development for several months.
we worked on every aspect of your animation process to make it as fluid and comfortable as possible.
the timeline is made for working quickly.
you can select your sheets, move them around through your layers and duplicate them.
you can manage your layers and animation sheets however you desire in a fully controllable timeline.
move, duplicate, split, time, invert, add inbetweens, import new images, etc.
Split your drawings and manage your timing
Select, extend and move all your sheets easily...
...even accross layers
our radial menu allows you to manage your sheets and layers as you need with one move of the pencil.
quickly add inbetweens
manage your timing of your selected sheets
merge your layers
use the magnet tool to remove all the gaps
with multi-touch gestures, you can flip through the sheets, play and pause your animation, undo and redo, transform and navigate through the timeline and canvas.
use multitouch to flip, play, stop and more
pinch to reset canvas, timeline and transformation
transform on multiple layers
import images, drag from other apps and drop in callipeg.
drag and drop images from other apps
export as callipeg peg files, mp4, gif, png sequences or single image.
we currently have 4 brushes : a brush, a marker, a pencil and a pencil hb, with color blending parameters.
you can already create your own brushes, add textures and change the tip(s).
our brush engine is built for the apple pencil and is powerful enough to consider major improvements.
callipeg also has a fully fonctional color wheel, with a sliders panel, a color history and customizable palettes.
you can manage your shots in the studio, group them into scenes and export them.
also, the inferface can be completely switched for left-handed artists (required and approved by the left-handed member of the team).
switch to left-handed mode in the settings

reviews by animation professionals : discover travis blaise’s work on https://instagram.com/sketchtoanimate. discover paul williams’ work on https://twitter.com/artporu . discover chiaki kanno’s work on https://www.instagram.com/monofilmo_official/
how can you get the app? after the campaign, callipeg will be available on the app store.
you can get callipeg for less than 5€/month or less than 50€/year for your production, school or any professional animation work you need to achieve on the go.
we exclusively use the appstore for ipad, so you can subscribe within one click and the app will be linked securely to your appleid.
why kickstarter? so far, we have been working on our free time and our own money.
the first version is ready to be released and will be available on the app store after the end of the campaign.

besides, to get callipeg to be even better, we want to push further the possibilities of the app with new features such as : a 2d camera to make your storyboarding and animatic process easier ; a transformation layer to create editable and reusable interpolated movements ; guidelines to place your image references around the canvas
and more features to come to make callipeg match your professional production needs.
10 000€ will be a good start to help us insure the development of the app to add bold and exciting features to make the animation process productive and enjoyable.
the more money we get the more time we can dedicate on this project, add new features, fix issues, and make the app a reliable tool.
how can you help us? you can help by donating as you wish and can.
you can also spread the word and talk about callipeg in your studio, your school, with your friends, or through social media.
join us on instagram, facebook and twitter to get news about the app.
to everyone who wishes to improve the animation possibilities in the ipad world, help us provide you with the best tool we can make!
one of our biggest challenges is to make the app as stable as possible for the users.
we already fixed many issues and the app is becoming better week after week.
the use of the ipad brings the matter of implementing powerful features on ios with an interface uncluttered and minimal.
every action must comply with the ipad ergonomics, the pencil and ios gestures.
we aim to create a tool able to complete all the tasks of 2d animation, from storyboarding to coloring and shading.
as we are a small team, we still need time and money to achieve this goal.
every project has its risks and challenges, but we are ready to commit ourselves to make callipeg one of your favorite tools!
ifriend is an advanced concept of a virtual friend and psychological assistant for self improvement
hello, everyone! thank you all for reading this project, i want to tell you about this mobile app “ifriend”.
before i tell you about the product itself, it's necessary to understand why i came up with it, and why it's important.
few years ago, i started using social apps to meet people and make new friends.
i enjoyed getting to learn about new cultures and connect with people who has different personalities and perspectives about life.
it was very helpful and i gained much knowledge about this life and i made many friends.

until i met people who suffered from depression, low self-esteem and have negative view about this life, as a friend, i tried to help and wanted to make a difference, to gain their trust, and find a way to make them see life in a more positive way, but i couldn’t for many reasons, such as: the misunderstanding of their personalities, yet their behavior; different time zones; lack of time- being busy.
that made me feel frustrated and trapped.
i want to make difference; i want to feel myself helping others.
therefore, i started thinking about a solution, a way to help people, not only who have mental troubles, but everyone.
at this point i came to realize that in our lives we need : needs company, needs someone to be with all the time, needs someone who listens to them, and shares their best moments together.
i started to think about the most common thing by everyone,there is it: the phone, everyone uses it and it’s always on our hands.
i was thinking about a mobile app that can easily help everyone to improve himself or herself and to make them feel positive all the time.
in addition, there is a huge progress in artificial intelligence that i should think about it and used for a noble purpose, and make the best version of ourselves.

i should mention that there is a huge progress too in facial recognition that can allow the program to understand the actual state ( if we are happy or sad or angry ….) of the human emotions we call it facial emotion recognition, to be able to find the right personality for you.
something else i must consider is the psychological side of human being and the different type of personalities.

thinking and searching about all these facts for one reason “to be able to create a full functional application that could combine the psychology with artificial intelligence to create a psychological model of our personalities for a noble goal to be able to improve ourselves”.
that is where ifriend comes in.

using modern technology and artificial intelligence, we can make a psychological assistant that can develop a model of our personality (introvert, extrovert, anxiety...), and help us to improve our lives as a virtual friend.

and i'm gonna list some of the programs that ifriend can ask you to do :  we will talk a little bit about the interaction with the user and the phone, we will implement a voice assistant, we call it zena,
thinking about all the voice assistant, they made a progress in changing phone’s settings and web search, but we need more than that.
that’s how i thought about a new virtual friend that can provide us tips in our life without asking it, like autonomous advice like all friends do.

zena will take the lead to ask about you and about your family at the beginning then it will make sure to give you an appropriate daily program for you, for example : ask you to run in new safe area or ask you to read certain books depending on your taste.
and finally, i will list some of the programs that ifriend can do : read a book or 1 personal development article a day .
and finally, i will list some of the programs that ifriend can do : learn a new language and find new hobby.
and finally, i will list some of the programs that ifriend can do : create an inspirational room.
and finally, i will list some of the programs that ifriend can do : overcome your fears.
and finally, i will list some of the programs that ifriend can do : wake up early.
and finally, i will list some of the programs that ifriend can do : get out of your comfort zone.
and finally, i will list some of the programs that ifriend can do : put someone up to a challenge.
and finally, i will list some of the programs that ifriend can do : learn from people who inspire you.
and finally, i will list some of the programs that ifriend can do : learn to deal with difficult people.
and finally, i will list some of the programs that ifriend can do : learn from your friends.
and finally, i will list some of the programs that ifriend can do : start a blog about personal development.
and finally, i will list some of the programs that ifriend can do : learn chess (or any strategy game).
and finally, i will list some of the programs that ifriend can do : stop watching tv.
and finally, i will list some of the programs that ifriend can do : let go of the past.
and finally, i will list some of the programs that ifriend can do : start a business venture.
and finally, i will list some of the programs that ifriend can do : show kindness to people around you.
ifrined will be based on artificial intelligence and facial recognition and psychology, it'll be hard to implement all these three big entity together.
and we have to make a lot of tests during finishing the app.
our app is totally friendly, it's gonna help everyone everywhere. mohamed ncir paris, francei am co founder of ifriend i'm interested in psychology and artificial intelligence.
i'm always positive no matter what happens and always looking for a batter self-development, and interested to know different culture and new people and how they think.
mgb tachometers digital conversion rvc 1410/00af . mgb - digital conversion of smiths instruments rvc 1410/00af tachometers.
as many of mgb owners know, taking care of an old mgb can become quite expensive and finding original parts can be quite difficult.
indeed, like any old car, at some point, parts have to be changed because they become defective.
smiths instruments rvc 1410/00af is no exception.
this tachometer is using coil signal and an analog circuit to work.
however, it is well known that this analog circuit can break at any moment making the whole tachometer useless.
parts to replace this circuit are not available anymore.
if someone send me the precise dimensions of rvc 1410 pcb, i can also adapt the circuit to fit this tachometer.
this is not part of this current campaign yet.
changing the complete tachometer can cost you over 200usd/€ while loosing this original look and feel.

however, an excellent work has been done by rick astley in 2012 to explain how this analog circuit works.based on rick's work and leveraging my personal electronic knowledge, i have decided to design, test and produce an electronic circuit to replace the original analog circuit and keep the look and feel of the original tachometer.
original smiths instruments rvc 1410/00af with the frequently defective electronic circuit on the right.

our electronic circuit is working pretty much the same way as the original analog circuit by analysing precisely the coil signal, calculating rpm and translating this rpm in pwm signal making the tachometer work again.
on the left, the original circuit, on the right, the prototype circuit working perfectly in my mgb.
final circuit will be clean and professionaly assembled without flux traces.

although this seems to be obvious, the new circuit is packed with technology and the pcb design has been optimized to filter the car power supply (reduce flickering chances) and handle properly the high voltage coming from the coil signal.
also, the circuit will be delivered with arduino source code and user manual if you want to precisely caliber it.
this circuit will allow you to keep you existing tach and simply change the circuit without having to buy a new one.
we can't garantee the compatibility with all exsiting tachometers but we will try to support you the best way you can to make it work.
chances that it will work flawlessly are very high, especially if you can caliber it mechanically (bent magnetic cup fingers) and electronically (using arduino ide).
it works perfectly in our 75 mgb.

to test if our circuit will have good chances to work well with your tachometer, you can try to measure to tach magnetic coil (m1+ and m1- in rick's document) meter resistance and if it's around 72ohm, you're good to go! plug and play for most users ; compatible with both positive and negative ground cars ; arduino ide and source to fully customize the circuit to your need ; user manual with all details will be available electronically ; keep your tachometer and original look!

although titled “rvc 1410/00 and rvc1410/00af”, using the marked references of the instruments used in mgbs, the same internal parts were used in a variety of different tachometers with different dial styling and/or included warning lamps and used in a number contemporary british and swedish cars.

these are believed to include, but are not limited to the: rvc 1414/00f, rvc 2010/00af , rvc 2010/02f, rvc 2010/d0f, rvc 2414/01, rvc 2414/01f, rvc 2432/00f, rvc 2432/01f, rvc 2610/01, rvc 2612/00, rvc 2615/00f, rvc 6418/00f, rvc 6419/00, rvc 6419/00f, rvc 6811/00f.
retrofitting all existing tachometers can be challenging.
there is a risk for compatibility as the prototype circuit has been tested and calibered on only one tachometer.
by making the circuit available, all backers will be able to re-use the whole tachometer mechanism without having to throw it away and buying a new one.
this will contribute to important material savings and preventing excessive consumption.

TellMe. your personal waiter in a click!
in a pub, bar or restaurant, scan the qr code on your table, order and pay with your phone.

the idea started one year back in time when while sitting with some friends in our favorite all you can eat sushi restaurant, we realized it would have been much easier to send the order directly to the kitchen with our smartphones instead of waiting for the waiter and friends to be ready for ordering.
tellme. is the solution designed for this! don't waste time, avoid queues and make it simple.
on site or at home, you can order and pay with your smartphone.
On site? Scan the QR code available on your table.
at home? select one of our partners.
Explore digital menus, no paper or plastic menus.
have a more interactive experience, visualize the pictures of your favorite food, dishes and drinks, and read detailed descriptions of the ingredients and the receipts.
make an order, add your favorite products to your cart.
don't wait for the waiters, don't rush because your friends already choose what to order, do it your way.
checkout your order, click on your cart and select your payment method according to our partner preferences, by cash or by card.
monitor the status of your order, until the delivery on site or at home!

retroblock 2 : the comfy retrogaming console. with retroblock 2 rediscover your childhood video games! alone or with friends (up to 4 players), in the train or on your tv!
after sucessfully launching raspiboy, retrostone and retrostone2 on kickstarter, 8bcraft is proud to present you retroblock2 !
the big thing we had in mind was the ergonomic, to get a handheld that is really comfortable to use.
also by introducing dual analog joysticks, we allow you to enlarge your gaming possibilities with precise and fluid control that is needed for shooter or adventure game.
for many ps1 games for instance.
but you will soon discover that it's more than that !
retrogaming is constantly gaining in popularity, especially with the development of single board computers (raspberry pi, orange pi...).
they enable us to make homemade retrogaming consoles as our previous version.
however those required lots of know how on electronics and diy.
you may have seen "gameboyzero" projects on internet and understand how difficult assembling one can be!
retroblock 2 is here to make your retrogaming experience even better !

you can use it to play to all your favorite old video game systems : gameboy, gameboy color, gameboy advance, super nintendo, nes, megadrive/genesis, nintendo 64, playstation 1, mastersystem, gamegear, atari, mame and so on.

in more technical terms they are basically sbc (single board computers) with all the peripheral needed to make a handheld console (screen, speaker, battery...), making it perfect to run emulation station/retropie.
so yes, all your childhood video games on one handheld console, that you can plug to your tv, and play multiplayer.
yes that's a high five to my-10-years-old-self!
the problem with most handheld gaming systems is that they sacrifice ergonomic controls for portability.
here, our goal was to make a comfortable handheld.
no more sore hands or thumb cramps after playing for a while!
and when you need portability above comfort, just take the sd card from your retroblock2 and plug it in your retrostone2 and you'r ready to go!
wait ! you are saying that we can play any game of our childhood, what does it mean exactly?
does retroblock2 comes with games integrated?
software : retroblock2 is compatible with retrorangepi (retropie distribution for allwinner processors. thanks retrorangepi team to have made a a20 version!!!).
retropie is an awesome emulation station software.
it comes with a wide range of systems supported : playstation 1, nintendo 64, gameboy, gameboy color, gameboy advance, super nintendo, megadrive/genesis, atari, mame and so on.
the interface is very intuitive, and highly customizable.
check here to see all the supported systems.
you can choose between a lot of themes!
games : to install a game, what you need is rom file.
a rom file is a computer file containing all the game's data.
you can legally download rom of unlicensed games on the internet.
some homebrew games of which makers agreed to have their games integrated into retrorangepi : retroid, run to databay, rope and bombs, into the blue. the legend of owlia, µcity, nomoles
for licensed games legality of downloading rom depend on your country.
in some countries you need to have original copy of the game.
in some others it may not be legal at all to download roms from internet.
then to install the rom simply transfer it with a usb stick to retroblock2.
i think there's a big potential to develop and share your games!
there's a topic on the 8bcraft forum dedicated to this.
also retroblock2 is also compatible with most other a20 sbc os (armbian, android...).
the dual analog joysticks allows you to play games using camera angle, subjective vision and other functions.
this feature changed and improved video games' user experiences.
hdmi output : you can connect retrostone to your big tv !
easy microsd access and soft-shutdown button!

play up to 4 players !
stereo speakers, dual joysticks with l3/r3.
screen is a 3.5" ips 640*480 digital, pc screen protector added for product durability.
on/off button is push type, pressing it launch a soft-shutdown.
saving you from sd corrupt of hard-shutdown.

the goal behind the application is to cultivate caring about the world that we live in by small actions which are rewarded with points and prizes .
1) i choose a category on which i want to act on.
2) i choose an amount of time that i grant for the activity
3) 3 activities are randomly chosed, by difficulty levels and points to win.
4) i do the challenge, for example planting a tree.
and i take a video of what i do.
5) when done, i send the result, i gain my points, which will allow me to gain prizes.
it can start by simple actions : planting fruits and vegetables, sending collective messages or awareness and education concerning air quality for example.
we choose a domain on which we want to participate, a time and a difficulty.
then put it into action, then we draw points that allow us to move forward in this quest for caring.

the goal of course is not directly to win prizes, but a reason why people would participate, and at the same time, this app would cultivate the attention we need to the world and global issues about the environnement in general.
by small actions, which in the long term and on a larger scale would be there to really serve us to cultivate this attention that the world needs today.
by making people more aware of global problems, and at the same time sharing precious informations by these little everyday acts.

maintaining your woodwinds in good condition is essential.
if you do not take the time to dry and clean your instrument after each use, mold and bacteria will develop.
swabs, when used, have limited efficiency and need to be cleaned after each use.
you can also hand clean your instrument with specialized products, but this is a tedious and expensive process in the long run.
two years ago, our team started designing a product that can take it up a notch and improve woodwinds maintenance.
the aim was to make woodwinds drying and sanitizing easier, faster and more efficient.
we are now proud to introduce moonlight.
moonlight : moonlight is a woodwinds dryer and sanitizer that helps you dry and sanitize your woodwinds automatically in only 8 minutes.
placed between the mouthpiece and neck of your instrument, moonlight will extract the hot and humid air and diffuse uv-c rays both inside the mouthpiece and inside the neck of your instrument.
these areas are known to accumulate most of the heat, humidity and saliva during play, making them the most important areas to dry, cool and purify.
ambient air diffusion dries and cools your instrument while preserving it.
uv-c rays are diffused inside the mouthpiece and neck of your instrument.
specifically adjusted connectors exist in 7 sizes.
they can be purchased separately if you want to use your moonlight with several instruments. saxophones : alto, baritone, soprano, tenor ; clarinets : a/b flat, bass ; transverse flutes (except gold)
how to use moonlight?
for optimal use and care, moonlight should be used immediately after playing your instrument.
if you’re not sure the instrument is clean or in case of instrument sharing, be sure to use the moonlight before playing as well.

how to use moonlight? (1) start by removing the mouthpiece from your instrument; (2) place moonlight between the mouthpiece and the neck of the instrument; (3) plug moonlight and press the button to start the drying and sanitizing cycle; (4) after 8 minutes moonlight will stop automatically. your instrument is ready.

moonlight efficiency : programmed to stop automatically upon completion of the 8 minute cycle, moonlight will issue a notification sound to inform you that your instrument is ready for use or can be stored away.
in normal use conditions, your instrument will be dry at the end of the 8 minute cycle.
in case of persistent humidity, the launch of a second cycle is recommended.
we have selected high quality uv-c leds with proven efficiency.
moonlight’s efficiency has been tested by univr music in collaboration with the m.b.
laboratory of the chu grenoble alpes.

specifications:  product features: humid air extraction and ambient air drying ; uv-c rays diffusion inside mouthpiece and neck ; 8 minute electronic timer ; comes with 1 pair of connectors for the instrument of your choice
dimensions & weight : dimensions : 67.4 mm diameter / 51.8 mm height ; weight : 50 g
power : input/output : usb-c port 5v/2a ; usb-c to usb-a cable ; usb-a charger ; can be powered through a wall socket, battery or laptop
for more information about moonlight, head to our website.
rewards : what's included with your moonlight order:  1 x moonlight ; 1 x pair of connectors of your choice ; 1 x usb-a to usb-c charging cable ; 1 x usb-a charger ; 1 x user manual
our mission: keeping their woodwinds in good condition is essential to all musicians.
at univr music we develop innovative solutions with the aim to make woodwinds drying and sanitizing, easier faster and more efficient.
for more information concerning our products, be sure to visit our website.

waan: the 1st fully connected lightsaber, larger than life!
the waan lightsaber has been funded – thank you so much !
– and we’re now thinking about stretch goals.
we’re convinced that waan already have all the awesome features required to become the ultimate lightsaber.
we don’t want to jeopardize or delay the project with complex stretch goals, but we really want to offer something for your crazy support.
many of our backers have shared nice and creative ideas and some have requested a public api.
once we reach 100.000 €, we’ll start working on a documented open api for developers and advanced users.
you will be able to write your own application on any platform and configure the waan directly (change color, reactions, sounds, ….)
using the bluetooth connection!
the open api will be released at launch, or shortly thereafter.
even if you’re not a developer yourself, you will still benefit from the community’s creativity.
thanks again and don’t forget : we’re always here to listen to your suggestions !
waan is the lightsaber, designed by experts and intended for all enthusiasts fed up with bad quality or fragile lightsabers!
with waan, choose your path and become the master of your battles.
balanced for real immersion with input from a professional swordsmaster, waan is composed only of high quality materials.
designed in france by a team of passionate researchers and designers, with every detail having been studied and scrupulously validated.
the handle design, blade strength, easy and quick blade change, all without any tools...
but waan's biggest innovation is how its sounds and the perfect responsiveness we achieved whether through its built-in speaker or via bluetooth.
we don't use embedded pre-recorded sound banks, but a complex algorithm and a powerful dsp (digital signal processor) to generate the audio flow in real time.
waan is, without a doubt, a truly exceptional lightsaber.
3d view of the first waan : s-waan
with battery. sketches by bertrand medas
dark or bright, no matter what your path is: waan will be the sword you have desired.
connect to its app, thanks to its bluetooth 4.2 low energy connection (in order to maximize autonomy), and customize it simply and completely according to your preferences.
you'll be able to choose from thousands of colors and an entire library of sound effects.
create different profiles to match your every mood and share them with your allies.
strengthen your ranks!
live and share a unique moment to the witnesses of your exploits: with the bluetooth audio stream of waan, your performances transmit incredible sound to your wireless speakers.
stream the sound of your sword live on a hi-fi installation, or listen on your own headphones for more comfort, without interruption and fluently thanks to a bluetooth connection.
french tv report french tv report solaari was created by ldlc (a french it reseller), bringing together several high-tech engineers, passionate about innovation, technology and ... science fiction.
and since (almost) nothing is impossible, they decided to make their dreams come true: design fun, trendy and very high quality products.
the waan lightsaber is therefore a perfect example of the merging of passion and technology.
why kickstarter ?
waan lightsaber has been conceived as a side project by our r&d team.
we worked on this project for more than two years, mainly in our spare time.
our original goal wasn't to release a commercial product, but only to assemble a few of them for our kids, friends and fellow fans of intergalactic wars.
their amazing reactions when we showed them our prototypes gradually convinced us that we have achieved something truly special, superior to other similar products already available on the market.
some of our co-workers think waan can generate a lot of interests all over the world.
they also suggested to start a crowdfunding campaign and we agreed almost immediately!
currently, we don't have enough funds to start a mass production to reduce costs.
that's why the future of waan is now in your hands. solaari by ldlc.
we understand and acknowledge that no project comes without risks and challenges.
despite our planning, there are circumstances that may be beyond our control.
if we are confronted by such events, we promise to communicate with full transparency to you, our backers, and work to resolve all issues in a timely manner.

better heat management and battery life : h3 is famous for overheating.

if you'r a casual gamer, the normal edition is probably enought for you.
pro version adds some non-essential features that may interest advanced users.

pro edition features : 8 gb nand memory. you may ask 'what's the point of 8gb nand when we can get cheap sd memory?'. answer is better boot time and better reliability. so idea is to have the operating system on the nand and rom library on the sd card.
pro edition features : sata m.2 connector : this enables you to add a ssd to your retrostone 2 (2242 form factor), this enables you to add up to 1tb !
pro edition features : joystick connector : this small fpc connector enable you to add a p**3000 joystick very easily (only need to drill a hole in the case).

pro edition features : resistive touch panel connector : currently retrostone2 does not have a touch panel as i have not found suppliers willing to work for small quantity yet. however in the future a touch glass may release, having the connector will enable you to upgrade it easily when it release.

pro edition features : additional glass protector : your unit will ship with the polycarbonate screen protector, however we'll ship along a glass screen protector. so depending on your preference you can change to the glass protector.
pro edition features : 64gb sd card instead of the 8gb (or 16gb with facebook share free upgrade! see below)

bazaroulette - fun mcommerce app. a mobile tinder-style e-commerce application with an integrated jackpot and surprise carts.
bazaroulette is a mobile online shopping and jackpot application.
its particularity is that the navigation is similar to that of tinder.
a left swipe to "not like" the only product presented on the screen, a right swipe to "like" the product and a button that allows you to add the product in question directly into the basket.
that's all!
in this way, we know the user's tastes and refine the products displayed on the screen.
the aim is to allow a design with fast actions and very easy to use.
another feature is to be able to send "surprise" baskets for yourself or your friends from a given budget and according to the tastes of the recipient.
early design jackpot screensearly design jackpot screensmy idea of creating the bazaroulette app comes from a meet-up i have done at the end of 2015.
it was my first one and was about android development.
at the end of the presentation, there was a talk and pizzas to eat.
with a group of few people, we talked about mobile design and how important it is.
later that evening, after going home, i was contacted by one of the attendees i had a chat with.
he exhibited me his project of m-commerce app.
i found his idea great.
rapidly, we began to work on an mvp but we abandoned it because of missing time on both sides.
it was not until 3 years later that i fell back on this project again.
i then decided to go for it until the end.
bazaroulette primarily targets young people aged 18 to 30.
those who are familiar with applications like snapchat or tinder.
to attract this population, the image given by bazaroulette needs to be young and cool.
with a strong presence on social networks.
that's why i'll need to hire marketing and graphics contractors.
the coding part will be done by myself.

at the end of the financing i will be able to: use the services of a marketing agency to validate my marketing plan; to pay for the various advertising campaigns ;  to complete the development of mobile applications on ios and android (android one nearly finish already!) ; to cover the various operating costs of the company and the operation of the application (registered trademark, cloud servers, security,...)

datetube- dating reinvented based on youtube subscriptions. a dating app focused on the common content we love.
i’m sure you would love to meet and exchange with people around you that love the same youtube content as you do but as of today it can only be possible if you help me!

video transcription : hi, my name is baptiste and i’m a software developer for a few years now i tried developing different projects with different ideas but never could make it in the marketing side of things.
i’m a tech person and not a marketer.
that’s why today i’m asking you for help.
in an era where content creation is becoming increasingly present in our lives and dating has become more and more difficult i decided to create a dating app focused on the common content we love.

as of now the app compares youtube subscriptions and shows you the similarities, but we can imagine a system in which in addition to youtube subscriptions videos liked and viewing history are compared.
having this automatic comparison will make it easy for people to know more about what they have in common with the other person.
no more empty bio or long hours thinking about what to write to break the ice.
the app’s design and more information can be found on my kickstarter page.

moreover, as you've seen in the video the design is ready and i think looks great (please contact me if you have any suggestions to improve it).
i'm thinking of voicing over the design of the app in order to explain it more thoroughly.

but here are the details of the app for now : (1) the matches could be sorted by youtube subscriptions similarities. (2) there is a red bar on top of the name of the person you're swiping that indicates a similarity percentage betwen your subscriptions and theirs
how funding will be used :in order to be able to meet people in your area we need to get the word out, that's why i think marketing will be an important point for the app.
development of the app is on me, sparing some money for marketing and server costs.
funding expenses pie chart

if the goal is met the app will be ready for early access around december 2019 if not before in case the goal is exceeded.
