Travelbugg, the new travel companion. A travel app that allows to tell people's travel and provide a collaborative travel guide.
the easiest way to share your travels : as a travel addict, i've been looking for an app to share my travels for a long time.
ever tried to do it with instagram or facebook? you can post, you can geotag but how do you see it as a whole? it's just one post after another.
free blogging system ? wordpress, squarespace? pretty good to tell your story but it's a lot of work to make it look like a proper travel blog.
and social features are pretty limited.
that's how i come with the idea of travelbugg where the best of the two worlds meets.
create your travel blog as easily as you post on social media and get a result that tells the whole story in one look.
create your own travel blog as easily as you would post on social media
get an overview of your whole trip, site by site
and with all the social media feature, be sure to stay in touch with your friends, familly and followers.
keep in touch with the people you care
a collaborative and tailor made travel guide but there's more to it.
if people buy into this, with all the information of where people have been, what they have done, where they have stayed, eat, etc.
we can gather all these information to build a collaborative and ever up to date online travel guide where the content will be created by the users and the users only.
and in adding a couple of social features - follow your friends or influencers, like posts, messaging, etc.
we'll be able to refine the recommendations so they suit your tastes and your way to travel.
Destination recommendation based on your own taste
for each country, get to know the places you're most likely to enjoy
for each places, see other travellers post
and as privacy matters to us, our engagement will be that no personnal data will be sold to any third party.
they will be used exclusively within the app to give the best possible advice.
use it everywhere and with the mobile app (still under development), you can use it everywhere, even where you have no network.
do you want to share a breathtaking view on the top of a mountain?
just open the app, take the picture and the post will be automatically geolocated (if you authorize the app to do so) and uploaded as soon as network is available again.
The main risk here, is the public engagement.
as the travel guide part is based on the users involvment, if nobody buys to the idea, the whole thing falls appart.
that is why i chose to go through crowdfunding.
i hope that the donators will get involved and use the app to create some content.
on the other side, if the app is a success, then the hosting cost might rocket.
but that's a problem i wish we'll have

As a famous quote states: "If you want to go fast, walk alone; but if you want to go far, walk together." when you are tired of walking alone and want to find a friend/friends to join you on the journey, we want you to be able to do that.
we want your dream projects, ideas to come to life.
to not let them disappear slowly.
like plants, projects need the most help and resources, when they are still in the form of ideas.
to make them grow into something, you need tools and expertise.
that is where co - lab comes in to picture : " an emerging digital workspace launches kickstarter campaign!"
"co-lab is an emerging digital platform and a technologically advanced co-existing workspace that is designed to provide like-minded people the opportunity to find each other and make connections."
let me tell you a story : over the years i’ve experienced and witnessed the power of collaboration and people working together.
the irony is that this unlimited potential that the internet offers, has in this case, essentially been left untapped.
there are no platforms out there yet that make connecting, sharing and working together on projects possible under one umbrella.

until now, if someone wanted to collaborate on a project, or have people join in and share in their project, that person would have to go through different platforms: first to link up and find like-minded individuals, and then, to find a way of connecting and working together.
let us be honest: it is a pain.
working on and starting a project, even a small or seemingly simple one, still requires a lot of energy.
if we add the stress of first finding, communicating and connecting with people on another platform, the entire process becomes tedious.
the workflow slows down, coming to a complete standstill, which only demoralizes you and your team in the process.
this is, why i want to develop co-lab : i want to give like-minded people the opportunity to find each other and make connections.
i want to create a platform whereby they can then communicate efficiently and seamlessly, in a democratic and team-oriented way, all under the same umbrella.
your personal projects

how it works: (1) you can either log in or just use the platform anonymously to browse; (2) once you start the application, the projects can be searched by filters (date, category, etc...) a big part of the application would be its search engine, where people could really find and get matched up with others that have the same interests; (3) you either start your own project or connect with people to collaborate on someone else's project by sending a request to join. the project leader can either accept or decline; (4) once you start the project or join up with somebody, the application provides you with tools to keep you on track (objectives, goals, milestones, chat, file-sharing, timelines,etc..) you can communicate easily with your group and vote on your next objective and discuss in which direction to take the project; (6) you would pay a subscription fee based on the size and duration of your project. there would also be a free plan option available.

co-lab comes with tools to help you keep track of your project: - collaborative tools like in-app chat and support for file sharing and exchange; - a round-table-like voting system, where everybody can vote on the a project’s milestones and share opinions; - timelines and back-end support making the process of starting your very own project, working on it with others, and seeing it to successful completion easier and faster. at later stages, an in-app donations feature will complete the project management capabilities.
the app will provide a stage for people to find each other, connect, share their passions and work together on projects.
the platform is set to empower and equip people with the tools to build work relationships and to bring collaborative projects to successful completion.
your personal project page
community(family) of your project
co-lab will be built to accommodate all types of projects and anyone will be able to use it anywhere across the world.

if you have a project that you are passionate about and have been struggling with starting it or you have a project that you are working on and would like to create collaborations and get assistance in it management, co-lab will be there for you.
thank you for listening and supporting us to empower oneself. best regards,team co-lab.
risk is to not understand this idea and boxing it into categories.
it is one of a kind.
friendlypay is an application of exchange of service between individuals to expose his need, around him, at the desired price.
my project : 6 out of 10 french have already participated in the exchange of services between individuals. from carpooling to computer repairs to bartering clothes, the list goes on.
for the french, the keywords are "opportunities, ergonomics and confidence" with less administrative burden, no intermediaries, more security, opportunities for small benefits, etc.

other terms stand out as "economic benefits, then social, sharing, commitment": benefits between individuals cheaper than those of traditional channels, access to what can not afford in traditional shops, consumption more responsible, more ecological or opportunity to meet new people.

friendlypay is an additional step in this process which tends to develop more and more since here the service is directly transmitted and displayed on the application by the one who is the transmitter, unlike the classic circuit where it is necessary to come to search in a list of offers the service corresponding to our needs.

our vision is to make the exchange of services freer and better adapted to the new generations called "connected" whose use of new technologies is a way of life in its own rightthe idea came to me from a situation encountered by a friend.
she needed to print her 175-page internship report which was due for the next day when suddenly her printer dropped her.
being a sunday in a provincial town, she had no open shop for printing, she had to take a train to paris, which is 1 hour away, to find a business where print his internship report.
in total, she will have spent almost 100 € and lost a lot of time ...

the idea of ​​friendlypay then appeared as a simple and practical solution because with the application she would have found a person available in his area who would have agreed to return him this service at a friendly price.
indeed, we thought a very simple application of use where the user can directly post his need and indicate the amount he is willing to pay against the exchange of this service.
the service appears like a bubble in a geolocation plan based on our location, which allows members around to view it and to respond.
the application allows the exchange between members on a service issued and also to negotiate on the amount proposed by the issuer.
setting up of the service and exchanges
the application is secure because members must first validate their profile will be verified.
transfers or payments are made only through the account-to-account application.
accounts and payments

the realization of the project will be entrusted to a very efficient team of developers and programmers who undertakes to respect very precise specifications so that the application respects a computer ergonomics designed to facilitate the users as much as possible and is very intuitive.
all the details and details of the application will be examined in-depth with the team that makes it so that nothing is left to chance.
our basic criteria are - exceptional graphic quality; - intuitiveness and perfect interaction; - flexibility of navigation from one page to another.
we will make sure
the rewards : friendlypay is part of an ambitious social project because we want to completely free the market of the exchange of services between individuals, in the interest of all.

in fact, it will be easier for you to find someone available to pick up your granny races at the local supermarket or to find someone from your neighborhood who is ready to help you set up the furniture waiting in the closet for several months now.
friendlypay also has an ecological scope in that it is possible to use a pointing device without acquiring it.
the friendlypay user will no longer need to spend money on a laminator or drill.
friendlypay is the union of friendly and pay which means "friendly salary".
the meeting and the collaboration make it possible to develop very important values ​​which are mutual aid and solidarity.
in a society where exchanges between people are increasingly rare, we aspire to change attitudes by accustoming people to adopt mutual aid.
we offer investors to take part in the adventure friendlypay if he wishes because we believe in the realization of the project, all supports are welcome.
from simple investors to shareholders, we leave the possibility to those wishing to get involved in the project the possibility of doing so since friendlypay also has a community vocation.

from the appearance in the “thank you” page, o the gift voucher offer, the recognition policies will aim to recompose all those who have believed in the project and made their contribution to the building, all according to the investment.
for the moment we only have a paper model.
although accurate it is by no means a prototype or a functional model which means that all the work is to be done.

to achieve this, we have solicited different teams of web developers for a financial estimate and prices vary from 40k to 80k euros for the realization of the mobile application, for the campaign marketing application and launch strategy.

we hope to make an aggressive campaign with no less than 500,000 web-posters advertising before the official launch on download platforms knowing that the goal is that friendlypay is part of the daily life of young people.
we want to get at least 50 new members every month.
however, calculating the projected costs of such a campaign is not easy to quantify precisely because it is a function of competition and influence statistics of the targeted web pages.
our calculation here is, therefore, an approximation from different studies.
the second part of the budget will be used for the creation of a portal site for friendlypay members to share their meetings and share their experiences, the goal being to create a real community.
we hope to complete our project on time and work hard to achieve it.
the development of the project will force us to become a legal entity.
the creation of a company is a long administrative process.
we have been thinking about this for a long time and are working on the legal part.
i have had several professional experiences during my career that i am sure will help me in the realization of this project.
thanks to friendlypay, it is possible to use a punctual device without necessarily having to acquire it.

in effect users of our application will have the opportunity to express their needs and find people nearby can help them: for example, if a member needs a drill, he expresses his need on the platform, and he will find a member in this geographical area can lend it to him without having to buy it.
self-help is an ecological behavior because it reduces compulsive buying and wasting.
niko amp by ministry of tones. niko's signature amp
discover niko's world :  we called this amp niko following the name of youtuber niko slash.
fond of the iconic guitarist, nicolas has spent his life working on covers of slash solos.
through is remarkable technical skills and underrated work this man ‘s become the specialist of slash’ tone.
at ministry of tones we’ve always been big fans and when we discovered niko’s work it was obvious that a day we’ll work together.
don’t misunderstood we don’t copy the tone, we’ve worked on the niko’s tone which is a bit different, the idea was to be in the “spirit of” but making it our way through this amp and a pedal!
moreover, the niko amp’s features foster everything needed to play in the same conditions as niko.
welcome to his world.

an all in one amp solution : we initially began thinking about the niko amp because we needed a solution that would combine everything we love in a guitar tone: a magic clean tone with enough headroom to play in a band and keep brightness, a british lead tone able to reach a very consistent gain level, and everything needed to make its use as easy as possible in every situation.
from your living room to the stage we focus on two words: plug and play.
when we started toying with the idea, we realized that it had the potential to change how electric guitar is perceived.

so we combined our expertise in electric guitar, vacuum tubes, design, music-making to create an amp capable of bringing you inspiration through its tone, ease the way to record it and make the both flexible following the place and moment.
the perfect link between your guitar and inspiration.
niko amp is just that – a simple and clever tube amp concept: no limit, no constraint, no headache.
how it works?
pure vaccum tube tonethe first point was to propose a real tube tone, no emulation or so on.
the niko amp’tone is forged trough five vaccum tubes: three12 ax7 for the preamp part an a duet of el84 tubes for the power amp.
no additional diode clipping or tone tricks everything comes from well drived tubes.
as we wanted it as versatile as possible we ‘ve designed two channels, one with a real clean and warm tone, the other one with a fundamentally genuine british lead tone.
trough an efficient common eq plus master and presence pots you are able to design your tone the way you want.
effect friendly amp : ministry of tones is primarily dedicated to guitar effects and their was no way for us to make an amp unable to to tackle with effects.
we added a switchable spring reverb to offer a possibility to play just with your guitar and amp with an amazing wet tone allowed by the two springs of our reverb tank.
additionally, we’ve designed a very simple but efficient fx loop to plug all your favourite guitar effects after the preamp.
delay, phasers or any exotic effect will have the perfect place to make your tone incredible.
but everything would be nothing without the perfect dynamics of the preamp to transmit every subtle change in your playing and reveal all the potential of your so loved pedalboard.
Niko's board!
power flexibility! as anybody is not able to play a 18w tube amp without vicinity constraint we ‘ve made possible to use this amp at low level but always with its proper richness and definition.
thanks to the embedded power attenuator calibrated on 5w and 1w you can reduce the overall volume of the amp without losing the mojo.
you can always reach the sweet spot wherever you play.
if it was not enough the triode pentode switch is again able to divide the output power by 2.
at the lowest your output power is 0,5 watts always with a good definition and preserved frequencies.
genuine character ready to adapt.
because you may make more than playing for yourself at home we ‘ve added two essential features for us.
the situation boost is designed to adapt your tone when you play in a band .
one issue while you play the guitar in a band is to ear yourself and cut through the mix mainly occupied by the singer, bass player and keyboard (and more).
thanks to the boost you keep your original tone set defined at home but you add volum and mid frequencies, enough to be eared and get the right place in the overall band mix.
last feature but not the least: the embedded direct in box which allow you to plug directly in a sono for a concert or in your computer interface to record.
especially designed for the amp it preserves all frequencies and really ease the setting on stage.
coupled with the last of our power reducer position called “silent recording” you bypass the entire ouput power to record it without a noise but the one you will have in your headset.
tube tone for everyone: single guitar player who need a genuine tone and flexibility ; music maker looking for easy recording solutions ; anyone with a creative mind and a love for electric guitar
essentially, what we did was take complexity and cost of tube amps to make it available for anyone.
the combination of simple technology ad considered design make the niko amp the ideal solution for tone that will leave your listeners in awe.

key features. easy to use : plug your guitar and choose you channel, tone will be instantly here flexible and adaptative: ready to face any situation from a silent night of recording in your home studio to the fiercest concert.
key features. designed for action: lightweight, durable tolex skin and metal corner t face any conditions.
key features. real 18w power: to play in the most violent drummer or band.
key features. adaptative ouput power: to adapt to any playing conditions in different environment.
key features. safe: vented enclosure and fuse protection prevents from any overheating even after a 5 hour gig.
key features. easy to maintain: easy access to the tubes and bias pot without tools. tube monitoring embedded.
key features. optional niko overdrive pedal if you want to reach the silver spirit of niko’s tone.
key features. includes 2 ways footswitch, power cable.

detailed specifications dimensions: 46x27x20cm total weight: 8,5 kg – 17 lbs 18 watts (rms) into 16-8-4 ohms tubes: two el84s and three 12ax7s 2-channel preamp ; pentode/triode switch ; gain and volume control control on lead channel ; normal volume control on clean channel ; 3-band passive eqs(bass, middle, treble) ; boost switch ; footswitch selectable channel switching and reverb (select aux) ; speaker output jacks: 4, 8,16,2x8,2x16ohm ; di box out (xlr out) ; spring reverb with level control ; fx loop ; tube monitoring system ; multilayer poplar enclosure with python black tolex and metal corners ; laser engraved faceplate and back plate ; jj tubes.

hoplite key manager. never forget or search for a password anymore. easy-to-use hoplite hardware password manager takes care of them for you!
hoplite key manager : we were not satisfied with currently existing password managers.
some of them were not secure enough, some were not reliable enough and some were difficult to use.
in short, no existing solution could be fully trusted.
so we created a hardware password manager we could trust.
this is why we focused on high security, made real by storing data in hardened hardware.
we then tailored user-friendliness without compromising security to make hoplite key manager easy to use even by a newcomer.
last but not least, we worked hard to keep hoplite price low even if it is made in france with premium parts.
thanks to hoplite, you can keep control over your data.

How does Hoplite work? hoplite is made of two complementary parts: a secure, handy, beautiful and armored hardware device storing the passwords and their associated data ; an intuitive, totally free and not connected companion app, working on all major platforms.
hoplite helps keeping your passwords and data safe and organized while allowing to always carry them with you.
you only have to remember one master password to unlock access to the thousands of passwords that can be stored in the device.
hoplite device stores not only your passwords, but also their related data, like account identifier, web site url, notes...

here is what makes hoplite different: secure: you and only you can access to your passwords. hoplite is not connected to any network and does not use cloud technology, so data can't leak. every single bit of data is stored into the hardware device and secured with military-grade encryption.

here is what makes hoplite different: easy to use: plug your hoplite to your computer or handheld device, start companion application then enter your master password. nothing more to do, you get access to all your precious data.

here is what makes hoplite different: reliable: all data are stored into hoplite memories, so memories must be really robust. thus, we choose the most reliable memory technology we could find, and we doubled the memories to have a backup. casing is armored and waterproof.

here is what makes hoplite different: beautiful: crypto devices do not need to be ugly. we designed a little, handy, light and extremely resistant casing while focusing on its attractiveness. hoplite is used all day long, so it must be nice to fit on your desktop.
hoplite is secure. high security concerns : hoplite keeps all your passwords and associated data (url, login, notes...) into its internal memories.
every time you save passwords and associated data, they all are encrypted using military-grade aes-256-cbc algorithm, then re-encrypted using field-proven and ultra fast chacha20 algorithm.
encrypted data is then written to hoplite internal main memory and replicated to internal backup memory.
the only way to decrypt your passwords and associated data is to know the key, which is the master password.
using double encryption allows to continue trusting in your hoplite even if one of this standard algorithms is reported broken in the future.

for even more security, a crypto-secure random seed is generated every time you save your data (before encryption steps), so the same data encrypted with the same master password will generate different encrypted contents.
all encryption/decryption is made by companion application on the computer or the handheld device it is running on.
this way, only encrypted data go through usb cable, preventing an attacker sniffing the usb traffic from stealing your data.
all these security features allow to prevent and mitigate a lot of common attacks, but even hoplite can't be fully secure if the computer or handheld device you use is compromised.
make sure that the device the hoplite companion app is running on is healthy.
fully non-connected solution : your data are stored only in the hoplite device.
hoplite hardware device does not have radio communication nor battery.
it connects to a computer or a handheld device through the new industry-standard usb-c connector.
all currently shipped computers and non-apple mobile devices feature at least one usb-c connector.

using an usb-c connector brings the following benefits: great compatibility with computers and handheld devices. no boring slow bluetooth connection or non-working wifi, no non-secure radio communication, no battery to take care of and no risk for it to burn your data.
also, hoplite application is never connected to the internet.
all operations made by the application stay local on the computer or handheld device.
how to backup hoplite? with hoplite, the user is the only owner of his/her data.
that means that user data is stored in no other place than hoplite memory.
so, what happens if the user has lost his/her hoplite?
hoplite app allows to easily duplicate a hoplite device encrypted content to another hoplite (the source hoplite device master password is of course required to be able to duplicate the content).
thus, you can backup regularly the content of the hoplite you are bringing with you to another hoplite that remains safely at home.
this way, you won’t be impacted if you have lost the hoplite you are carrying with you.
that's why we are offering even more discount on hoplite backup pack, which contains a mobile hoplite to bring with you and a backup hoplite to let at home.
hoplite is easy to use : hoplite hardware device content is accessed only by its companion app, which comes in desktop and mobile versions.
applications are totally free and work on all major platforms but ios.
why isn't ios supported? because iphones and ipads use proprietary lightning port instead of standard usb-c one, so a dedicated cable would be necessary, and this is not hoplite philosophy.

only 3 steps are required to access to your encrypted data: plug your hoplite to your computer or handheld device using future-proof usb-c connector ; start the multiplatform app on your computer or handheld device ;  enter your secret master password. you're done.
you have to remember only one master password.
it can be as long as you want, and not necessarily a password.
it can be a sentence, song lyrics, or even l33t speak.
only two rules apply: choose something not obvious, or someone stealing your hoplite could be able to guess it, do not forget it, as there is no way to recover your data without the master password!
instead of a fancy but slow and unstable application, we decided to focus on stability, ease of use and fluidity.
don't expect a tremendously beautiful user interface, but do expect a fast, reliable and low resource usage application.
in other words, something suited for security.
how to use the application?
desktop and mobile applications are meant to be used the same way.
obviously, mobile app features a touch-displays compatible user interface.
as it's always boring to read a user guide, apps are designed to be fluent and intuitive while offering a lot of features.
your passwords are organized in groups (they show as tabs in the desktop application).
you have room to create thousands of passwords, and remaining free hoplite memory is always displayed at the bottom right of the desktop application.
you can associate metadata to each of your password: login, email, web site url (when double-clicking on a password web site url, the web site will open in the default web browser), and even notes.
with hoplite key manager, you can always carry with you all your identification data and use them on every computer or handheld device, even if it is not yours.
if it not yours, be careful and make sure the computer of handheld device is not compromised!
most of us use several devices every day, and up to now had to keep in sync browser favorites, passwords, and logins between these multiple devices and incompatible operating systems.

hoplite allows you to forget all of this and prevents some phishing attacks in the same time: by opening web sites url through hoplite app, you don't need web browser favorites anymore and you are sure that the opened web site is the one you defined.
simply copy the login and password to the web site, then discard clipboard content by clicking the app dedicated button.
you are now logged to your web site!
here is how to unlock access to your passwords and log to a web site.
application is running on windows 10.
hoplite apps feature an advanced password generator.
it allows to simply generate a really strong password with a single click, or even to easily customize the password generation to fit some web site specific rules.
here is the easy-to-use advanced password generator.
application is running on macos 10.14 mojave with dark theme.
here is how to add a group of passwords (groups are called tabs in the desktop application) and to add a password to this group.
application is running on xubuntu linux.
hoplite is reliable : memories are rugged. your data are stored into hoplite memories, and in no other location.
memory must then be very reliable.

we searched a lot and selected the most rugged memory technology we found: 200 years (yes, two hundred) of data retention, 1000000 (one million) minimum write cycles, temperature range from -40°c (-40°f) to +85°c (+185°f).
to improve robustness, we put not one, but two of these memories.
the second memory contains the exact same content than the first one and serves as backup.
and to make things even more reliable, we make sure that main and backup memories always come from a different production batch.
electronic board is rugged : all hoplite electronic parts are oversized and carefully chosen to make the circuit lasts as long as possible.
as the electronic board is manufactured in our factory, you are guaranteed that all electronic parts are genuine.

all capacitors are multilayer ceramic capacitors with x7r dielectric and 5x to 7x voltage margin: they do not fear time, power supply could power more than 10 hoplite boards and is designed to be extremely efficient when powering only one, usb-c connector is waterproof and shown no evidence of physical damage after 10000 insertion/removal cycles, board is protected against electrostatic discharges up to 8000v (iec 61000-4-2 level 4), usb interface chip is working on all computers and mobile platforms since years, microcontroller has been sold by billions and works since years in million devices.
casing is rugged casing is entirely made of 2.5mm-thick robust aluminum.
all casing internal is potted with isolated silicone to make sure hoplite is really waterproof.
we made several tests that comforted us in telling that casing will resist to life's everyday troubles : after that, everything is still working!
hoplite is environmentally aware : reliability can be achieved while taking our planet future into account.
we choose to avoid using hazardous chemical materials in order to protect living beings and environment: hoplite does not contain any tantalum, lithium or lead.
all electronic parts are rohs certified.
hoplite is made in france, in our own factory, which is both iso9001 and iso14001 certified.
we managed to outsource manufacturing steps as little as possible, and the subcontractors we use are locals or located in a bordering european country, in order to decrease carbon dioxide emissions.
hoplite packaging is made of a robust, reusable and ecological natural cotton bag to avoid throwing more plastic away.

to go further with sustainable development, we decided not to provide an usb cable with hoplite for two reasons: everyone owns yet one or more usb cables, coming from smartphones or tablets. why produce another cable that will remain in a drawer? ; hoplite user may need and usb-c to usb-c cable to use with modern devices, or maybe an usb-c to micro usb-a cable to use with older handheld devices. moreover, he or she may need an usb-c to usb-a cable to connect hoplite to a desktop computer. so what cable to provide?
hoplite is beautiful : hoplite is handy and lovely.
it fits perfectly on your desk
it fits perfectly in your pocket or handbag
hoplite has an ideal size
and comes in a strong ethically-made 100% cotton bag
hoplite is made in france : hoplite is made in our french factory, using only genuine parts and taking care of waste.

this certification will prove that our product is truly secure.

full’street was born of a double observation : one out of four workers plans to create or takeover a business one day, but 72% of them do not launch for lackone of visibility and network.
for the most stubborn, it takes almost two years for their projects to begin to take shape ; for others, it will be abandonment
in view of these untapped projects and means, many businesses are vacant and make our city centres less and less animated.
of course, the hyper growth of e-commerce is one of the main factors in this situation.

but, the physical entrepreneurs, whether it be retail, catering, service, are struggling to retaliate because from the outset, launching their business is more complicated and proportionately more risky
yet, there is a growing awareness of the people for the safeguarding of their city hearts, a place of life and conviviality par excellence.
young people in particular, express their strong attachment to their local spots and nearby shops better meet the new expectations of consumers if they were better structured.
finally, our general vision of work has changed and we are more and more looking for meaning in our daily activity and wanting to exercise or even reinventing our job through business creation.
what if we reverse the trend ?
what if we created the "airbnb of entrepreneurs"?
a platform that would help all project holders and young businesses to embark on a more secure and efficient way and take the plunge.

this is full'street's twofold goal: (1) make entrepreneurship even more accessible by giving everyone the same chance to realize their dream of creating a business ; (2) multiply the social link in the city centres by contributing to their sustainable metamorphosis.
this is an issue of general interest, both economic and social in nature.
to create your business is great, to keep it and to grow it’s better !

despite rising figures, mainly because of the status of self-entrepreneur, we learned from the ground that some factors are more or less blocking : the budget, the lack of network, the lack of visibility and confidence, the ignorance of the entrepreneurial ecosystem, the fear of failure.
the support at each stage of creation, in a coordinated and continuous way is then a crucial asset for the entrepreneur.
today the failure rate of a non-supported company is 40% against 20% for a company benefiting from a support.
what does full'street bring ? full'street was designed by entrepreneurs for entrepreneurs to bring them precisely the right service at the right time.
it is true that there are today many structures that accompany entrepreneurs in their legal process.
other actors offer tips, tutorials, all made recipes, e-learning, blog, coaching...
they have the advantage of motivating, inspiring, giving leads to get started...
but it is still up to the entrepreneur to do everything by himself.
he has received the theory, he must now put into practice, alone!
because we have been there too, we want to talk about action and solutions.
full'street goes beyond mere support by piloting with the entrepreneur his project.

we want to encourage especially the women initiatives often braked by social and psychological barriers (self-censorship) or financial (less access to bank financing), the initiatives of experienced seniors who have developed a business know-how throughout their careers.
in general, allowing the greatest number of people to flourish professionally while creating jobs.
then how can we invite more future entrepreneurs to start or prevent abandonment along the way ?
the answer seemed obvious to us.
we must fill the three main obstacles to entrepreneurship : time, money and visibility on the implementation of the project.
we have studied many business creations and selected best practices to develop a five-step process that meets all the needs related to the structuring of the business in the future.

we have worked, and are still working to recruit the best operational professional services that by becoming our partners will carry out each of the missions necessary to the realization of the creation projects or the working business digitalization.

how does it work ? full'street is a platform taking the form of a "market place" online that facilitates and secures all the steps of business creation by linking creators and executives with professional service providers involved at all stages of the project : (1) concept, (2) registration , (3) point of sale , (4) support functions , (5) digitalization.
our network is composed solely of experts validated by our team, with whom we have already collaborated or for which we have received recommendations from trusted third parties.
full'street is not a directory and therefore is not intended to list all professional services.
we operate a selection of those that best meet the needs of our target.

to go even further, we are developing with the actors of the french tech an artificial intelligence, an algorithm capable of prescribing the right service at the right time according to the project to create.
this intelligence is nourished by all available data concerning the companies of the territories : sector of activity, capital, implementation, executives, etc.
finally, we try to negotiate at best all our tariffs in order to reduce the costs associated with the creation.
as a centralized and online tool, our format adjust to the life of the entrepreneur, allows him to advance his project 24 hours/7 days.
in a few clicks it is possible to do a simulation of its project and to obtain an appropriate operational response.
it therefore has a more precise view of the financial and temporal investment necessary for a good structuring.
a full'street community, a true antidote to isolation, will allow a better sharing of experience.
entrepreneurs will be able to exchange, advise, support and weave networks.

who’s for ? full'street's mission is to make entrepreneurship more accessible by addressing all the profiles of creators : the young graduate who does not imagine himself an employee, the pensioner who does not have the desire to stop, the executive in full professional retraining, the woman who would like but dare not take the risk, the one who has already attempted but who has failed (for lack of real supervision), the one who is ready to embark but does not know where to start.
our service also targets merchant entrepreneurs who will have to purchase or to rent a local ; they are the least consumers of consulting and/or accompaniment.
full'street is also aimed at companies already established who want to boost their growth by digitalizing their activity and introducing the innovative tools that facilitate them daily management.
full'street endowment fund : our mission is not only operational.
we want to go further by even modestly contributing to the financial support of full'street entrepreneurs who would encounter difficulties beyond creation.
we are going to build an endowment fund with a steering committee that will meet in a defined timeframe to study the files and determine the tunable aid.
our company full'street is committed responsibly to remit to this fund a percentage of its annual turnover as of its second year of effective activity.
We've worked, believe us! And we invested almost 10.000 euros out of our own pocket!

Seven months for : finalize the project in every details; win a prestigious competition to enter the world's largest incubator station f (incubator hec);  bring together a motivated and experienced team (cfo coming soon); draft the technical specifications of the final platform; find the developers who will create it; find our visual identity and communication style; determine our financial, marketing, and partner recruitment strategies; make our first landing page; find the first professional services partners (experts, legaltech, real estate network, point of sale designers/offices, accountants, human resources, commercial and financial directorates, lawyers, tax specialists, graphic designers, webdesigners, marketing agencies, logistic services, e-commerce site vendors, etc...); build links across the atlantic, in the usa, to predict our internationalization, with the first local partners. full'street was received until the pentagon in washington dc and was able to build its very first bases thanks to the invaluable help of the university of virginia and its business school darden business school; working with local authorities close to employment and business development issues;  and put together this salutary campaign.
1st of december 2018 - washington dc - virginia university. darden business school1st of december 2018 - washington dc - virginia university.
now, since we are well launched, we need you to make full'street the reference tool of entrepreneurs.
we need to see more and more of "day one"!
help us to realize the vision of entrepreneurship that we carry with enthusiasm and determination.
the end game is to take part in an innovative project that wants to become a tool of equal opportunities, a facilitator of dreams and ambitions.
entrepreneurship is undoubtedly the form of work that is experiencing the strongest growth and nurtured the aspirations of the new generation of assets.
and for those of you who may not yet be concerned today, perhaps you will be tomorrow...
what will the funds be used for ? the funds raised during the kickstarter campaign will allow us to create, develop and launch our platform full'street.
build a "market place" online requires real expertise, time and money.
your funding is going to be used in a first time to the remuneration of a team of 2 web developers for 3 months.
our full'street platform will be able to see the day with a computer version in the first step.

whatever the level reached, your financial support facilitates negotiations with investors who will allow us to carry our business on a large scale.

and because we need the greatest number of support, beyond your financial involvement, we rely on you to be the first ambassadors of full'street by sharing and speaking about us and our tool.

no glue, no residue : keep your webcam clean & shiny with nano-suction technology webcam stickers and all-metallic microphone jammers.
because its christmas !! and we hate shipping charges
the technology behind buster is a viable solution to the many cracks in our ever-connected system.
easy to produce and easy to use, buster uses no glue and no liquid adhesive, never leaving any residue or mess on your webcam.
governments and other organizations are tracking and recording people every day.
the 2016 elections results and interview by cambridge analytica revealed some scary facts.
those in the know – like facebook ceo mark zuckerberg and former fbi director james comey – tape their webcams regularly.

in his nsa leaks, edward snowden broke the news that our iphone and blackberry devices' cameras are vulnerable to backdoor access, and recently revealed news report hackers recorded hundreds of women and minors via their devices' cameras before the authorities caught them.
the technology behind buster is easy to produce and easy to use, and without any glue or liquid adhesive, it will never leave any residue or mess on your webcam.
this means that you can use your webcam when you need it – and that no one else can, especially not without your permission.

compact and sturdy (at either 13mm or 40mm), buster can go where you go, so if you are spending the night away from home with your laptop, you can stick buster in your bag and know that it will be ready for you at the end of the day.
buster covers are made with abs, making it 100% waterproof and dustproof.
the microphone jammer is made with high strength aluminium, it sustains physical damages and is rustproof.
in addition to the nano-suction webcam blocker, buster also comes with an aluminum microphone jammer, affording you the complete protection that you should be able to expect.
finally, you can reclaim your privacy and keep all leering eyes out of your bedroom.
buster can be used in more than one way !
you can also cover your sensitive documents like credit card cvv, bank info or signatures.
credit card cvv is infact one of the most stolen info during credit card hacks.
most covers are made with plastic or metal, making them abrasive.
buster's abs material acts as a spongy cushion and protects laptop when it is closed, acting as a shock absorber.
so you can shut the laptop as you please, your screen remains protected against shocks.
go out on a rainy day or spill coffee on your phone ?
buster protects you.
here is a demonstration.

size chart for different deviceswe chose the colour red for buster because in ancient indian philosophy, vermilion(bindi) is a red mark placed on the forehead to block the mythological third eye or universal eye, as this eye is believed to be responsible for destruction of the world.
in a real way, buster will block out any third eyes (or fourth eyes, or fifth eyes) that threaten to watch you when you would prefer to be alone.
the stickers come in two sizes, small (13mm) and large (40mm).
the small one fits most everyday gadgets like smartphone, tablet, laptop, smart tv etc.
the larger one is designed specifically to block any hidden security cameras or to protect your professional camera against dust or water.

after testing various materials, sizes and colour combinations, and user feedbacks we are proud to finally present you the final version with the most appealing aesthetics (based on different user scenarios and their feedbacks)
we have secured manufacturing partners and our first batch is being produced ! buster is all set to roll out soon..
after many prototypes and testing, we are sure to bring buster to the market by march 2020.
about us : why care about webcam covers ?
cyber attack/ cyber bullying and blackmailing is a billion dollar global industry, whose stake holders are not just pirates but even governmental and non governmental agencies.
i discovered this when pop up screens were repeatedly appearing on my screen, asking for accesses to files, location & camera.
upon a brief research i figured out this was cyber piracy.
hackers based in remote countries try to steal & blackmail users with sensitive information.
the softwares that control webcam or their access can be easily hacked.
the most practical & easy solution to this is a physical camera cover.
so i started out using cheap stickers sold by major e-commerce retailers.
within a week or less these stickers would just peel off leaving behind a messy residue on my phone.
this got me worried if i should risk spoiling my expensive phone, laptop and other gadgets worth thousands of $$ with cheap & unreliable stickers.
this led me to look out for a clean and practical solution that can be used on any gadget.. and voila !!
...led to the invention of a lifetime that was how i came up with the idea for buster – a simple, minimalistic webcam blocker that doesn't use any glue or liquid.

because the same people who hijack webcams can often hijack the mechanical webcam shutters as well, buster is the only solution that is both viable, reusable and designed to suit all types of devices.

this nano-suction blocker will last a lifetime, as many as 25,000 usages, safeguarding against prying eyes and maintaining your privacy, which is something that ought to be a given in today's world anyway.
team : firstly, thank you for supporting our campaign!
we are hari & kevin, two entrepreneurs and gadget enthusiasts.
we all use them, consume vast amounts of data, but how safe are we in this globally connected world?
this got us investigating the matter of cyberattacks and cam hacks.
soon, we discovered that it wasn't limited to hackers, but even the government agencies spy on us... so, we decided to do something about it.
hari is an architect & product designer based in the small french city of lille, he likes to use something to cover up the webcam.
sick of using tapes, he wanted to design a solution that comes out clean.
kevin is an advisor.
he has extensive experience in marketing at funderbeam investments, and is a member of european youth parliament.
kevin has mentored and collaborated with many startups helping them secure investments and scale up.
today, it costs less than one dollar to hack into someone's webcam.
that is how easy it is.
cyberhacking has ballooned into a major industry all around the world, and security experts are in a perpetual arms race with thieves and criminals.
in this instance, going back to basics makes sense.
buster is a minimalist solution that relies on no complex technology to remain operational.
while scaling up manufacturing and distribution will present their own challenges, they pale in comparison to the challenges that software development with similar results would present.

what i need & what you get : having already incorporated my company and started the legal processes , i am confident that i am ready to expand my operation to retailers across europe and offer this important innovation to people all around the world.
my goal is to raise 10000€ through this campaign.

that will cover my baseline production expenses, and if i can raise 50000€ or more, i will divert the rest to a wider-scale marketing campaign – and offer everyone who contributes, a discount voucher on your next buster through our e-commerce store.
(perfect as a gift for the holidays).
i promise in my best efforts and to take the complex challenges ahead and keep my contributors in the loop regarding all the progress that i am making, remaining transparent throughout this process.
symfony 5: the fast track. symfony 5 will be released in a month.
i have not written a book about symfony since 2009 if my memory serves me well.
it was about symfony 1.4.
to celebrate 10 years of no books from me, what about writing a book about symfony 5?
symfony has evolved dramatically during the last few years and the developer experience improved significantly.
i have the feeling that most symfony developers are still "stuck" with old habits and that they have a hard time embracing the new ways of developing applications with symfony.
i can understand some of the reasons.
the pace of evolution is staggering.
when working full-time on a project, developers do not have time to follow everything happening in the community.
i know first hand as i would not pretend that i can follow everything myself.
far from it.
this book is not just for existing symfony developers.
it is also about showing non-symfony developers the power of the framework and how it can improve their productivity.
i also feel the need for a new book as the web evolved a lot.
topics like apis, spas, containerization, continuous deployment, and many others should be discussed now.
your time is precious.
don't expect long paragraphs, nor long explanations about core concepts.
the book is more about the journey.
where to start. which code to write. when. When. How. i will try to generate some interest on important topics and let you decide if you want to learn more and dig further.
i don't want to replicate the existing documentation either.
its quality is excellent.
i will reference the documentation copiously in the "going further" section at the end of each step.
consider this book as a list of pointers to more resources.
the book will describe the creation of an application.
from scratch. to production.
we won't develop everything to make it production ready though.
the result won't be perfect.
we will take shortcuts.
we might even skip some edge cases handling, validation or tests.
best practices won't even be respected all the time.
but we are going to touch on almost every aspect of a modern symfony project.
controllers, twig, http client, mailer, workflow, api platform, docker, webpack and encore, easyadmin, messenger, doctrine, and more.
the book will be "open-source" and published on symfony.com.
i would also like to print at least 1000 copies for symfonycon amsterdam.
we are running out of time, but i will do my best to deliver.
i need your help to fund my time.
if we get extra money, it will be used to sponsor symfony development by symfony sas (javier, nicolas, and me).
i might not be able to finish the book in time for the release of symfony 5.0.
symfony 5 should be stable enough as soon as possible.
that's not the case right now as the full ecosystem is not yet compatible with the new version. but i like challenges :)
a creativegroupreview: a platform for secured and verified information exchanging.
the request of digitalization solutions is undeniable nowadays in the core process of any company.
but, this web 2.0 movement is made with many types of platforms where the most popular types are: the enterprises social networks; the electronic document managers; the share places or groupwares.
but across these solutions, anyone is able to propose inside the same tool, the most useful services that a company needs to focus on his business processes and perform in his daily activity.
this is where the opportunity to create « creativegroupreview » comes.
«creativegroupreview» is an enterprise unified communications solution and an electronic document manager.
it is used to : design format of information wanted in a process; digitalize work process; verify information by fact-checking; diffuse information in an efficient way
this is a new concept of a platform, which is respectful of the user’s private informations.
it is professional, ergonomic and well secured with encrypted data.
its goal is to connect people to work together around a project and create reliable value from verified information.
who need this platform ? any person or structure in the need to collect, verify and diffuse reliable information to create valuable impact.
it can be used by universities, enterprises or scientific communities.
what is the innovation coming from this platform ?
the security : your data are encrypted inside the data base. your are the only controller of your data to delete or archive them.
the information structure : only verified and ranked informations are diffused inside the platform.
the ecological impact : the digitalization of the business processes helps to reduce the waste of papers.
security and respect of your privacy is our commitment.
the risks of the project : lack of funding for technical resourses : servers, security of data, humans resources for users support, development of new features.

sunrise, the lamp that takes care of seniorsits revolutionary technology automatically detects all falls and alert neighbors or family when help is needed. when we get older, we’re not as strong as we used to be, but that doesn’t mean we should stop enjoying life or become dependent on someone again.
sunrise, the lamp that takes care of seniors. its revolutionary technology automatically detects all falls and alert neighbors or family when help is needed.
when we get older, we’re not as strong as we used to be, but that doesn’t mean we should stop enjoying life or become dependent on someone again.
sadly, all it takes is one fall when no one is around to lose everything.
staying one hour too long on the floor is enough to lose your freedom, your house, your health, and sometimes your life.
to enable our elders to live alone without getting left behind, we created sunrise, the lamp that takes care of seniors.
the lighting in the lamp was designed to improve mood and sleep, but it’s most important feature is its revolutionary fall detector.
sunrise knows within minutes when its owner needs help so it can immediately call someone at a time where every minute counts.
it’s smart enough to know if it’s a false alarm and won’t bother family, neighbors or first responders every time you pick something up from the floor.
how does it work ? you simply plug the lamp in, wear the portable device, and it works if you are in a 15 meters perimeter around the lamp.
no data or video recording is necessary for its use (privacy guaranteed!) nor do we “guess” that something happened based on lifestyle derived information because everybody has different habits.
we simply know when the wearable device is in a dangerous place , within inches.
below is a more detailed description of how sunrise works: when you are too close to the ground for an unusual amount of time, sunrise will call the first name on your contact list.
don't worry, it won't alert everyone every time you tie your shoes, because sunrise can tell when it's a normal movement!
with the countryside version of sunrise, your garden is safe!
one outdoor lamp is enough to cover a large property in perfect line of sight conditions.
below is the latest design of our prototype.
we think it's quite nice and it can fit well in most houses.
however, design for the lamp and the wearable device still needs improvement... design has a significant psychological impact on the person who wears the device which is why it's no small detail.
having a sunrise should make you feel safe and happy, which leads to better health!
below is a picture of our first prototype (as seen in our campaign video).
see how far we've come? we could go even further with your help!
our technology : aids for elders and fall sensors already exist, but few of them can show results like ours.
we detect all falls, even slow soft ones, with a radio-based technology made-to-measure in europe that knows when you’re abnormally close to the ground or in an incorrect position.

the lamp detects in real time where the device you’re wearing is, communicating with radio frequencies so high and fast (low power gigahertz with picosecond pulsing) they’re impossible to hack and harmless to your health (uses 20000 times less power that a mobile phone).
this technology is used primarily for military and medical uses, where reliability and precision is a matter of life or death.
radio frequencies can communicate through walls in a 15 meters perimeter (50ft) inside a building.
however, every wall adds a small margin of error, this is why we recommend buying one lamp for every main room if you live in a large house to keep false alarms to a minimum.
outdoors, this technology can send information in a much greater perimeter, covering an entire garden easily.
this drawing shows how sunrise lamps can cover your house and your garden.
rewards. in pounds: 62£ for one extra lamp and 53£ for each extra lamp if you take more than one.
for total safety, 1 lamp = 1 main room (excluding restrooms and corridors).
however, in houses where walls are thin, 1 lamp is enough for 1 floor.
if you want to know the perfect number of lamps for your house, contact us at serenitycontactfrance@gmail.com.

our story : “during a winter night in 2015, my grandmother fell down in front of her house and died after eight hours in the cold. her fall detector didn’t work because she fell down too slowly. i realized this was the case for far too many people” – samuel schneider of serenity

“i had a similar experience with my grandmother, who would not push her button when she was lying on the floor, having forgotten she had one, and subsequently losing all confidence after this event (thus becoming 100% dependent on others)” – armand collier of serenity
both of us decided to come up with reliable solutions for the elderly, working with an engineering company from the south of france with whom we knew we shared a similar philosophy on business.
they patented a cutting edge location technology to help navigate robots, but always knew it had much greater potential.
this is why they were happy to help us with this idea!
we don't simply buy technology from them, we developed a real partnership.
from this collaboration, sunrise was born.
this lamp was built by sons and daughters, grandsons and granddaughters, who will also grow old one day and expect technology to be worthy of older generations.
(*the other brilliant engineers were too shy to appear on this page)

why we need you : tired of hearing people say “sunrise could have saved my grandfather if it had come out a year earlier” or “my fall detector is in a drawer, somewhere”, we want to put a reliable product on the market as soon as possible that could potentially save tens of thousands of lives every year!
we have factories in france ready to manufacture sunrise and all we’re missing is money; we are low on cash having invested everything to get to this point.
that is why we need your help to launch properly in the right conditions!

if sunrise is the perfect fit for your family, then please don’t hesitate to help… every donation will help us attain our goal and put sunrise in the houses of isolated elderly who have no one to buy it for them.
after 4 years of joint development and 750 000€ of investment to create the perfect sensor, we need you to make sunrise a household item.
AIDEO. world's first video editor by artificial intelligenceyour rushes, our algorithm, your video.
aideo can create, upload and sheduled the perfect video with ai.
aldu studio presents, a new project : aideo is designed to facilitate the life of a youtuber, a streamer or merely an artist who wants to engage in the creation of content.
aideo is a website where our artificial intelligence performs the editing of your video, the upload and the scheduling for you.
currently, to forge a robust community around your content, there are several secrets, the quality, the originality and also the regularity of production!
however the average time it takes to publish your content is 10 hours.
we think you shouldn't have to spend hours on editing.
instead of explanations, here's what aideo can do : it is unnecessary to waste money on a full-time video editor to edit your video!
make your live stream, your plans for your vlog, or your gameplay simply and our ai will create you the vlog, the best-of or the perfect content.
an online website : here is the first visual of the aideo page, it is modern and straightforward.

here is an example for the creation of a best-of gaming, in this example, it is a live stream replay twitch imported directly with the twitch api, aideo automatically detects the type of rush and the template to use for editing.
this image shows the manual version of the use of aideo, but of course you do not have to go through this interface once your settings are made.
aideo can edit your video, upload and schedule it on youtube.
below the second image shows an example for the creation of a vlog.
the architecture of the video is very different for editing a best-of.
with this, cutting plans and music will be automatically chosen for a perfect rendering.
compatible platforms and scheduling : the interest of the aideo algorithm lies in its ability to upload videos without human intervention.
if you make 3h of twitch live stream, a best-of will be created, uploaded and scheduled according to your settings.
everything is configurable.
in its first version, aideo uses only the twitch and youtube api (yt gaming), but it is planned that the platform apis: dailymotion and igtv are supported.
for your files saved from your computer or for any other platform, it is, of course, possible to add rush stored on your computer in the formats: mp4, avi, .wmv, .mov …

why use platform apis like youtube and twitch? this allows you not to need to manipulate giga data and only import them from twitch directly to aideo and upload the rendering to youtube with professional connections of several g / bits per second.
you can import your videos or live stream replay simply by indicating the url of the video, very convenient for not having to download hours of live stream.
it is also possible to use aideo in an automatic version that is to say it will automatically live stream replay.
it will create editing, upload, and schedule according to your settings.
aideo technology : aideo is based on a clear image and sound analysis tone.
that is to say that it will analyze the sequences of the most apparent characteristics to the least obvious.

to do this, aideo uses cloud automl vision as well as internally developed assev (ambients sequences by significant elements video) which allows to link and interpret cloud vision data as well as give a mood to a video clip.
for the explanation of the technology we will take the example of a replay from the twitch streamer, ninja : the algorithm will first determine the types of rushes it has to do.
to do this, it will begin by analyzing significant elements present in the video.

technical preview of assev : at the moment aideo can recognize and analyze only three main types of elements: first the plane of a camera face and its emotion, secondly a landscape or gameplay, and finally the composition of sound.

once this determination is made, the algorithm is left with a vision of your video that boils down to a sequence of types of shots and a note of the interest of the sequence, visually it looks like this.

aideo automatically determines the type of template to use to edit the video, (vlog, best-of ...)aideo will then cut the bad and keep the best sequences, add your intro and outro select the best passage to put it at the beginning.
once your video is ready according to your configuration, you can let aideo upload, render and schedule the video to youtube.
as we said above, to allow quality cutting without human intervention we use cloud automl vision.
coupled with assev to allow andam adapt the analysis of cloud vision to video sequences.
to understand what cloud automl vision is here is a video explanation.
introducing cloud automl vision

the atmosphere of the sequences to better shape them : the selection of sequences is based on the analysis of the atmosphere of the video at a time t this part is in constant learning, that is to say, that the ai learns more and more by doing montages so it will be more and more precise.

the analysis of the sequences is done on several precise characteristics to obtain the maximum amount of information at a given moment of the video here is someone : each attribute of features has sub-variants.
several elements allow the algorithm to detect a significant moment in the video or to understand the mood of the sequence.
thanks to the characteristics collected the algorithm can make associations and know the atmosphere of the video at a given moment.
demonstration: here is an example that relies on the facial expression, the image and the sound of the video to choose the music that will accompany this sequence:
roadmap : we want to allow donors to have access to a beta of aideo at the end of 2019
here is the complete aideo roadmap:

the economic model: the economic model of aideo is not set, but to offer you the best quality we want it to cost something, we do not want a version with diminished functionality, or with a logo integration that spoils your video.
aideo would be proposed initially at $ 9 per month for its final version, and the price would be divided by two during its beta phase.
for kickstarter donors, well-on access would be free depending on your donation.

the future of aideo and explanations of the kickstarter stretch goal : starting from $ 50,000, the adventure for aideo will begin, the software will be released online in beta version at the end of 2019 for donors and then in public version at the end of 2020.

later in 2020, we want to develop an algorithm to create your thumbnails, descriptions, and titles of your videos automatically, and finally, we want to release a module for a camera and video software in 2021 to select the sequences that you want to see in your final rendering.

its innovations cannot see the day if the above goals are exceeded, here are some explanations on the kickstarter stretch goal:if $ 75,000 is reached, during the full release end of 2020, aideo will support several languages ​​, and it will be possible to add custom effects from the aideo interface.
moreover, at over $ 100,000 we want to move quickly on the development of our thumbnail algorithm and the creation of a camera module.

you probably think that the algorithm is fine but that you can no longer choose the final sequences that will appear or not in your final video, for this we thought to develop a compatible module on most cameras composed of only three colored buttons representing different types of sequences and importance when processing aideo.
this module also comes with software for the sequence selection during the gameplay capturing, but also to make some adjustments before giving your rushes to aideo.
but always have the least human intervention to allow efficiency and productivity at its peak.
discuss with the aideo team : we invite you to join the discord by clicking on the image below to follow the progress of the kickstarter and discuss the project with the aldu studio team.
the amount of information stored and analyzed for a second of video is significant as the processing time of the video may be high for a replay of several hours for example.
the first learning of the ai will be realized during the beta end of 2019.
the test life-size may not produce the perfect video from the beginning.
that's why we count on you donors who will have access to the beta to understand that it will take time to adapt.
bassme - wearable subwoofer.
what is bassme? Don’t just listen. feel your music.

with the power of a personal subwoofer on your chest, bassme propels the sound into your heart the way it was intended to be experienced by combining a state-of-the-art sound wave and vibration system.
this brings your senses a new dimension of an elevated auditory experience, immersing you in your music, movies and games.
today, more and more entertainment content such as video games are consumed without sound systems or via mobile devices.
the problem is that when listening with earphones, you don’t get that full feeling.
you don’t feel the sounds.
unfortunately, many listeners raise the volume to crazy high levels in an effort to get that “kick”, an emotional auditory we all want when playing games or listening to music.
bassme delivers the vibes exactly to where we like them: straight to your core.
the vibes are so pronounced that with bassme, users often reduce the headset volume because they are receiving the tactile sensation, so you're also protecting your hearing.
bassme was designed by music lovers looking to ehnance their sound experience.
no matter what activity you are doing, bassme can be there with you.regardless what shape or size, adapting to your comfort is priority through its ergonomic design and “soft touch” material.
connect your headset via bluetooth, place bassme on your right shoulder and start your music, video games or movies for a unique experience.
the subwoofer should be installed in the center of the chest, at the sternum to use the ribcage as a sounding board.
dive as if you were in action.
be at the center of your favorite movie.
hang on to your plane seat while you enjoy the rhythms of your favorite band.
feel the sound in your bones as you discover what's behind your system.
bassme has the capacity to completely immerse users in sound when coupled with other mobile technologies, such as gaming consoles, smartphones and audio devices.
the story of bassme started at the startup weekend perpignan competition in october 2017.
for 50 hours, we worked and gave life to the project.
finishing first in the contest, we decided to continue the adventure together.
the company studio-duroy begins its activity with the marketing of bassme, the accessory that gives life to sound.
we are a team that understands the relationship between sound, emotion and immersion.
we are a group of passionate people.
we believe bassme can improve many areas and bring people closer to the immersive content of today and tomorrow.
we are very excited to introduce this device.

specifications: dimensions: 17,5 cm (h) x 5,7 cm (w) x 2,8 cm (d) (310 g); inputs and outputs: micro-b usb port, 3.5mm jack; additional details: bluetooth range: 9 meters, battery charging time: up to 3 hours, battery life: up to 6 hours of listening, per full charge cycle; power : 26 watts; super bass system; plug and play; strong and durable; 1 year warranty.
bassme is compatible to any headset and any audio source.
simply connect your headset to bassme and with any gaming gear, any mobile device, any console, pc, tablet, home cinema with bluetooth or audio cable.
enjoy an audio sensation unlike any other, without bothering your neighbors.
want to write about bassme?
feel free to email us at contact@studio-duroy.com.

blendup : share your playlist with your friends. blendup is a mobile application which allows you to put together the playlists of your friends with your playlist.
blendup is a mobile application which allows you to put together the playlists of your friends with your playlist.
so, you can listen with your friends a neutral playlist which respects the choice of everybody.
the graphism of the application is already done but the technical development needs to be conducted.
the app will be free and available on ios and android.
nowadays only 20% of the music available on the streaming platform are listened.
is there only 20% of good music on streaming applications? no, this is just because there is not any good algorithm in the application of streaming to make you discover new artists.
the companies like spotify are hiring some employees to create some playlists but these are the same for everybody.
blendup will help you to discover new music but also talented artists.
an algorithm will be set up to help you to discover the music you will like.
this algorithm will be created thanks to your music regularly listened but also with your favorite music style and similar profiles.
the artificial intelligence is the most important part of the application because it avoids to fall in a flow of popular music.
this popular music is good but is very repetitive and some people don’t like it.
however, blendup will not be a musical streaming application because the cost of a server and the remuneration of the artist is too important.
the concurrence between the different type of platform is also very dissuasive.
however, you will have the choice to listen the playlist on your favorite streaming application.
blendup will be a free application with some advertisement when you create a playlist to make the application profitable.
however if you want an application without advertisement there will be a premium version which will only cost 0.99 $.
this premium version will also allows you to create bigger groups dans playlists.
we can observe that during the last 5 years the streaming is taking more and more importance in our life and it will continue to grow.
this market is taking some parts in the physical one and it surpassed it since 2016.
consequently, the number of people affected by the application will be bigger.
a special feature will be developed if the app is successful.
this is the blendup bracelet.
the night clubs and the bars could buy a blendup license to use the application for their customers.
so the clients will have the possibility between two music published by a video projector to determine the next music.
this vote will be done with the bracelet.
it will be directly connected with the application to save the music you like with the like button.
an important strategy will be instore to help the development of blendup.
it will begin by a big approach on the social medias.
when some people will be conquered the next step will be to pass on a b to b version.
the goal is to sell our application to some bars or night club so their customers can use it to choose the music.
this will help us to get some new customer which will discover the application thanks to the bars but also to get some income.
the other way to get some revenue is through the advertisement on the application.
however, a premium version will be available with no advertisement.
the advertisement will help us to reimburse the cost of the server.
the last step is to do a big publicity campaign in the festivals because the first targets are the partygoer.
blendup is an application which is divided in two ways.
the first one is the application for private.
in this case blendup will be confronted with some problems.
firstly, the application needs the permission of the different streaming application to synchronize the playlist of the users.
this will be the hardest part to negotiate.
nevertheless, we already went in contact with some application and they are very motivated to cooperate with us.
secondly, the application for private will not be very profitable.
the ads and the premium version will help us to cover all the cost of it.
other ways of getting some money is also conceivable with the selling of some data to some festivals or concert.
the part the most profitable will be the business to business version.
actually, the bars or night club will pay a subscription to use the application as a professional.
this will help us to get a consistent source of income.

our reasons behind this project : we are aware of the great size of humanity's challenge with regard to energy and access to energy.
the natural and social environments are geting deteriorated more and more because of energy.
energy becomes expensive and its rarity causes a lot of problems.
the demand for energy will continue to grow in line with the rising demand for a better standard of living, the growth of the world's population and many other causes.
renewable energy as it is today is not a real solution for our real problems.
infinite energy alone is a solution for all energy problems, infinite energy will revolutionize all types of transport.
will revolutionize agriculture and access to freshwater.
your contribution will increase the hope of solving these problems.
our engine in the environment

products that last : as we presented in the video and as you can see in the links in the video, our engine uses an energy that is active in matter since creation, it is the binding energy of atoms and particles , this energy is not and never was a source of pollution and above all it is active without waste.
recyclability : although the life expectancy of this engine is very important as it is based on a fundamental phenomenon of the comprehension of matter.
if we go back to the description of the patent, we find that the constituents of the engine are easily separable, which is what makes it profitable and adds to the effectiveness of recycling.
